La situacin ms difcil es que no tena suficiente animales para ofrecer pero con loa financiamientos sali adelante. El financiamiento que actualmente solicita es para la compra de ms ganado. Su deseo es expandir su negocio para salir adelante.
texts.en: Pedro Celestino is 52 years old. He has a business buying and selling livestock. He makes his purchases in communities where get gets the most favorable prices, so that he can provide for the daily needs of his family. The loans that he has taken have always been used to invest in his business. At the beginning he did not have enough income, but gradually he was able to buy cows, bulls and calves and have his own business. The most difficult situation was when he didn't have enough animals to sell, but with the financings he was able to overcome this problem and get ahead. The loan that he currently requests will be used to buy more livestock. His wish is to expand his business so that he can improve his economic situation.

loan.use: working capital to buy livestock

loan.name: Real Friends Group

texts.en:
Jeneba A. is the leader of this group of entrepreneurs. Jeneba was born in Kenema, a city in eastern Sierra Leone. Jenebas husband is retired and her three children attend primary school. Jeneba sells soft drinks, gara lappers (locally dyed clothes) and charcoal. She has been running this business for six years now.
This is the first loan that Jeneba and her group members have applied for from SMT/Kiva. With the help of this loan, they will be able to expand their businesses, make more sales and consequently improve on their living conditions. Jeneba will use her share of the loan (500,000 SLL) to expand her business. She will buy the above mentioned items in large quantities to add to her business.
(Also included at the left of the photo is loan officer Edna B. Conteh, handing over the loan to the borrowers).

loan.use: Buys soft drinks, gara lappers (dyed clothes) and charcoal

loan.name: Karin Pilar

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal JUNTAS Y UNIDAS; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Karin Pilar; la socia tiene 36 aos de edad, casada y tiene 2 hijos; la socia se dedica la venta de material de construccin como ladrillos entre otros ms, la socia lleva ya un buen tiempo en este negocio ella trabaja conjuntamente con su esposo, la socia es una persona bien alegre y con muchas ganas de salir adelante.
La socia solicita el prstamo para la compra de ms material de construccin para su negocio.
La socia est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Karin Pilar is a member of the community bank "Juntas y Unidas" [Together and United], located in the Cusco district in the province and department of Cusco.
Karin Pilar is 36 years old, married, and has two children. She sells construction materials, like bricks and other items. She has worked at this business for a long time, and she works with her husband. She is a happy person with a drive to succeed.
She is asking for this loan to purchase more construction materials for her business.
She is happy with the loan provided and promises to make her payments on time.

loan.use: Purchase construction materials

loan.name: Njong

texts.en:
G. was born in 1960. She is married and has four children. She has struggled with hardship in her life. Growing up, her family was very poor and could neither pay for her education nor send her to learn a trade. The situation became worse when her father, who worked odd jobs to support the family, passed away. G. was married young and has spent most of her life farming.
In 2009 she became a member of GHAPE and was trained on how to manage a loan and a business. She has been able to manage a single loan and has learned how to sell palm oil; raise animals such as pigs and fowl; and farm crops such as cassava. The profits from these loans were used to educate her children, buy clothing for the family, and provide for the basic household needs like fish and magi (a flavor cube used in all Cameroonian cooking).
Given this loan, G. plans to expand all her activities: farming cassava, raising pigs and fowl, and buying and selling palm oil. She says her business is going to succeed because she has been farming since the age of five when her parents began to teach her.
The Grounded and Holistic Approach to People's Empowerment (GHAPE) is a non-profit NGO based in Bamenda, Cameroon. GHAPE works towards the empowerment of the poor and poverty alleviation through a highly multi-faceted approach. Every client is trained in business management, basic health, life skills, financial management, profits and losses, and family values. Clients are also required to contribute a small amount into a personal savings account; most clients save much more than the minimum requirement. GHAPE instills a sense of family and community within its clients and staff and has developed a strong bond of trust between the organization and its clients.

loan.use: To expand agricultural business

loan.name: Nerida

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal JUNTAS Y UNIDAS; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Nerida; la socia tiene 39 aos de edad, casada y tiene 3 hijos; la socia se dedica a la venta de artesana como chompas, gorros, guantes, pantalones, polos entre otros ms, la socia lleva aos en este negocio el cual se encuentra ubicado en el centro del cusco en una de las av. Mas importantes como es la Av.Sol, la socia est contenta con este negocio ya que mediante este ella saca su familia adelante.
La socia solicita el prstamo para la compra de ms mercadera para su negocio y as tener ms variedad de productos que ofrecer a sus clientes.
La socia est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Nerida is a member of the Juntas y Unidas (Together and United) communal bank. The bank is located in the Cusco district, Cusco province, Cusco department.
Nerida is 39 years old, married, and has three children. She sells hand-made items like sweaters, hats, gloves, pants, polo style shirts, and many others. She has been in this business for years. The business is located on one of the most important avenues, like Avenida Sol, in the center of Cusco. She is happy with the business because it is through the business that she gets her family ahead.
She is requesting a loan to buy more merchandise for her business. That way she will have a greater variety of products to offer her customers. She is happy about the loan, and she pledges to make her payments on time.

loan.use: To buy more merchandise in order to have a greater variety to offer her customers

loan.name: Aidalina Esmeralda

texts.es: Aidalina Esmeralda M. es una mujer trabajadora, esforzada y emprendedora quien tiene una repostera desde hace varios aos. Ella realiza desde tortas, pasteles, bocadillos, pan, pico etc. M. con el crdito comprar un horno ms grande que les permitir realizar mejor su trabajo en especial los pasteles.
texts.en:
Aidalina Esmeralda M. is a hard-working and enterprising woman who has owned a bakery for a few years. She makes cakes, pastries, sandwiches, bread, and other items.
With this loan, Aidalina would like to purchase a larger oven that will allow her to do her work better.

loan.use: To buy an oven

loan.name: Luz Marina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal JUNTAS Y UNIDAS; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Luz Marina; la socia tiene 39 aos de edad, casada y tiene 3 hijos; la socia se dedica al negocio de turismo ella tiene ya hace varios aos atrs su Agencia de Viajes el cual brinda el servicio de Turismo de Aventura brindando las siguientes rutas : Camino Inca, Salkantay, Choquequirao entre otras rutas ms, la socia es una persona bien alegre y entusiasta, mediante su empresa la socia saca a su familia adelante y esto es algo que le hace sentir bien ya que su familia es el motivo que ella tiene para seguir adelante.
La socia solicita el prstamo para la renovacin de nuevos equipos de aventura.
La socia est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the Juntas y Unidas [Together and United] communal bank. The bank is located in the district of Cusco, which belongs to the province of Cusco and the the department of Cusco.
The member is Luz Marina. She is 39 years old, is married, and has 3 children. She works in tourism and has had her own travel agency for several years. Her travel agency provides adventure tourism service on the following routes: the Inca Trail, Salkantay, and Choquequirao, among others. Luz Marina is very cheerful and enthusiastic. This business allows her to provide for her family, which makes her feel good because her family is her motivation.
She is requesting the loan to purchase new adventure equipment. She is very pleased by the loan and she promises to make her repayments

loan.use: To purchase new adventure tourism equipment

loan.name: Hope To God 1V Group

texts.en:
Mabinty K. is the leader of this group of entrepreneurs. Mabinty was born in the village of Foredugu. She is married to a driver and the couple has two children. Mabinty has had many years of experience in selling cooked rice.
This is the first loan that she and her group members have applied for from SMT/Kiva. With the help of this loan, they will be able to expand their businesses, make more sales and consequently improve on their living conditions. Mabinty will use her share of the loan (500,000 SLL) to expand her cooked rice business. She will buy cooking materials like rice, palm-oil, onions, tomatoes, etc. in large quantities.
(Also included on the left of the photo is loan officer Edna B. Conteh, handing over the loan to the borrowers).

loan.use: To buy rice, palm-oil, onions, tomatoes, etc. in large quantities

loan.name: Rosario Angela

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal PATRON SAN SEBASTIAN; Este banco est ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac, provincia de Cusco, Departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra: Rosario; La socia tiene 60 aos de edad, la socia es casada, la socia tiene 1 hijo; la socia tiene una agencia de viajes y ella se dedica a administrar su negocio, la agencia de la socia se llama Inversiones Viset Per; la socia tambin alterna su trabajo y se dedica a la venta de ropa, la socia saca el prstamo para invertir en la compra de ropa para la venta.
La socia est feliz con el prstamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Rosario is a member of the community bank "Patron San Sebastian", located in the Huanchac district in the province and department of Cusco.
Rosario is 60 years old, married, and has one child. She owns a travel agency and she works to run her business. Her travel agency is called Viset Per. In addition to the travel agency, she also sells clothing.
She is asking for this loan in order to purchase clothing to sell.
She is happy with the loan provided and promises to make her payments on time.

loan.use: Purchase clothing to sell

loan.name: Ral Harold

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal JUNTAS Y UNIDAS; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
El socio es el Sr. Ral Harold; el tiene 38 aos de edad y es casado y tiene 2 hijos; el socio tiene 2 negocios uno de ellos es un cabina de internet que est abierto todo el da de lunes a domingo el socio trabaja conjuntamente con su esposa, a la vez el socio cuenta con un carro que brinda el servicio de movilidad escolar el socio cuenta con la ayuda de una persona para realizar esta actividad, el socio es una persona bien alegre y con muchas ganas de seguir adelante por su familia.
El socio solicita el prstamo para el mantenimiento de sus computadoras y para comprar algunos accesorios para su carro.
El socio est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos
texts.en:
Raul Harold is a member of the "Juntas y Unidas" ("Together and united") communal bank, located in the district of Cusco, in the province of Cusco, department of Cusco.
Raul is 38 years old, married with 2 children. He runs two business. The first one is an internet booth that's open all day from Monday to Sunday where he works alongside his wife. He also has a car with which he runs a school transportation service. He has one person helping him with this activity. He is a happy person eager to support his family.
The member is requesting a loan for the maintenance of his computers and to buy some accessories for his car.
He is happy with the loan and is committed to repaying it as agreed.

loan.use: Computer maintenance and purchase of car accessories.

loan.name: Sara

texts.es: Sara Isabel Z. Gonzales es una mujer trabajadora, esforzada y emprendedora de 54 aos quien tiene un negocio de venta de materiales de construccin, arre de materiales y servicio de cisterna desde hace 10 aos. El negocio se ubica en San Judas, Managua. Ella con el crdito lo ocupara para legalizar una camioneta que acaba de adquirir.
texts.en:
Sara Isabel Z. Gonzales is a hard working 54 year old entrepreneur. She owns a business which sells construction materials, transports materials, and offers a cistern service. The business is about ten years old and is located in San Judas, Managua.
She will use the loan to register a recently purchased truck.

loan.use: To register a truck.

loan.name: Justa

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal JUNTAS Y UNIDAS; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Justa; la socia tiene 42 aos de edad, casada y tiene 2 hijos; la socia se dedica al negocio de venta de productos de belleza como cremas, perfumes, colonias, entre otros ms, la socia trabaja como consultora de belleza de la lnea Esika, ella lleva aos en este negocio el cual le trae satisfacciones tanto personales como econmicas, la socia es una persona bien alegre y con muchas ganas de salir adelante ya que mediante este trabajo la socia saca a su familia adelante.
La socia solicita el prstamo para la compra de ms productos y as tener ms variedad que ofrecer a sus clientes.
La socia est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Justa is a member of the "Juntas y Unidas" (Together and United) community bank which is located in Cusco district, in the province and department of the same name.
Justa is 42 years old, married, and has 2 children. Her business is selling beauty products such as creams, perfumes, colognes, etc. She works as a beauty consultant for Esika. She has been in this business for years and it brings her both personal and financial satisfaction. Justa is a very cheerful person who has a great desire to get ahead in life. Through her work, she gets her family ahead.
Justa is requesting this loan to buy more products so that she has a wider variety of goods to offer her customers. She is happy to be receiving the loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loan.use: To buy more products so that she has a wider variety of goods to offer her customers.

loan.name: Always Good Group

texts.en:
Meet with members of the Always Good group from Waterloo, a small town in western Sierra Leone. They are all local entrepreneurs who have come to SMT, a partner of Kiva.org, to apply for a loan of SLL 3,800,000 for the entire group. With the help of this loan they will expand their businesses, make more sales and consequently improve their living conditions.
Mariama J. is the leader of this group. A native of Waterloo, Mariama is married and has 5 children who are attending primary and secondary schools. For the past 6 years, Mariama has been selling charcoal and fire-wood. With her share of this loan, she will buy charcoal and fire-wood in large quantities to add to her current stock.
(Also included on the left of the photo, is loan officer Edna B. Conteh, handing over the loan to the borrowers)

loan.use: To Buy charcoal and fire-wood in large quantity to add to her current stock

loan.name: Elsa Maria

texts.es: Elsa madre soltera, sus hijos son independientes y le ayudan con algunos gasto del hogar, desde hace un tiempo inicio su propio negocio y fue con ayuda de lo prstamo en la financiera que logro establecer su pulpera, se le presenta dificultades cuando se enferma se mira obligada a cerrar. Sus planes son aumentar las ventas mediantes la inversin de nuevos y variados productos. Con el prstamo comprara mercadera variedad como: golosina, refresc, lcteo, jabn de lavar, abarrotes, granos bsicos entre otros productos. Agradece a la financiara por el apoyo al desarrollo de su negocio y cambiar su nivel de vida.
texts.en:
Elsa is a single mother. Her children are independent and help her with some household expenses. She started her own business some time ago. With the help of a loan she managed to set up a grocery store. However, it is difficult when she becomes sick because then she has to close her store.
Elsa's plans are to increase her sales by investing in new and varied products. She will use this loan to buy a variety of merchandise including candies, soft drinks, dairy products, washing powder, groceries and basic grains. She is grateful to the financial institution for the support they have provided to her in making progress in her business and changing her standard of living.

loan.use: to buy merchandise

loan.name: Josefina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal PATRON SAN SEBASTIAN; Este banco est ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac, provincia de Cusco, Departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra: Josefina; La socia tiene 58 aos de edad, la socia es casada, la socia tiene 1 hijo independiente; la socia tiene su agencia de viajes y turismo llamada Haes, esta agencia queda en la av. Sol, la socia trabaja administrando su agencia y viendo directamente todo el manejo de la misma, la socia invertir el prstamo en la compra de tiles de escritorio, y en la agencia de viajes, ella har unos prepagos y una vez que le giren el dinero ella cancelara los tickets. La socia solicita el prstamo para invertir en su agencia de viajes y turismo.
La socia est feliz con el prstamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Josefina is a member of the "PATRON SAN SEBASTIAN" community bank which is located in Huanchac district, in Cusco province, in Cusco department.
Josefina is 58 years old, married, and has one child who lives independently. She owns a travel and tourism agency called Haes which is located in Avenida Sol. She runs her agency and directly oversees its management. She will invest her loan in buying stationery supplies. In her travel agency she will make some prepayments and once they send her the money she will cancel the tickets. She is requesting this loan to invest in her travel and tourism agency.
Josefina is happy to be receiving this loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loan.use: To invest in her travel and tourism agency.

loan.name: Salud Y Vida Group

texts.es: El grupo Salud y Vida est conformado por tres mujeres trabajadoras una de ellas es Juana Aracely H. desde hace 16 aos inicio su pulpera con una pequea mesa la cual dice conserva como reliquia. Ella decidi tener su negocio propio para poder dedicarles ms tiempo a sus hijos. La otras integrantes son Mireya O. M. quien vende ropa desde loa edad de 13 aos primero le ayudaba a su madre y desde hace 30 aos vende de manera independiente y Marbelly Gmez tiene una pequea venta.
texts.en:
The 'Salud y Vida' (Health and Life) group is made up of three hard-working women. One of them is Juana Aracely H.. 16 years ago, Juana set up a grocery store with just a small table that she tells us she still keeps as a reminder of that time. She decided to set up her own business so that she could spend more time looking after her children.
The second member of the group is Mireya O. M. who has been selling clothes since she was 13 years old. She started out helping her mother and has now been working for herself for the past 30 years. The third member is Marbelly Gmez who has a small sales business.

loan.use: To buy basic grains

loan.name: Telma

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal JUNTAS Y UNIDAS; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Telma; la socia tiene 51 aos de edad, separada y tiene 5 hijos; la socia se dedica al negocio de venta de productos de belleza como cremas, perfumes, colonias, entre otros ms, la socia trabaja como consultora de belleza de las lneas Natura,Dupre y Leonissa ,lleva aos en este negocio el cual le trae satisfacciones tanto personales como econmicas, a la vez la socia vende desayunos de forma ambulatoria todas las maanas ,la socia es una persona bien alegre y con muchas ganas de salir adelante ya que mediante este trabajo la socia saca a su familia adelante.
La socia solicita el prstamo para la compra de ms productos y as tener ms variedad que ofrecer a sus clientes y para comprar algunos insumos para los desayunos que hace.
La socia est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Telma is a member of the 'Juntas y Unidas' (Together and United) community bank which is located in Cusco district, in the province and department of the same name.
Telma is 51 years old, separated, and has 5 children. Her business is selling beauty products such as creams, perfumes, colognes, etc. She works as a beauty consultant for Natura, Dupre and Leonissa. She has been in this business for years and it brings her both personal and financial satisfaction. Telma also sells breakfasts as an itinerant street vendor every morning. She is a very cheerful person who has a great desire to get ahead in life. Through her work she manages to get her family ahead.
Telma is requesting this loan to buy more products so that she has a greater variety of goods to offer her customers. She also wants to buy some supplies for the breakfasts that she makes.
Telma is happy to be receiving this loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loan.use: To buy more products so that she has a greater variety of goods to offer her customers. To buy some supplies for the breakfasts that she makes.

loan.name: No Weapon Group

texts.en:
Salone Microfinance Trust (SMT), a partner of Kiva.org in Makeni, northern Sierra Leone, is very please to present to you members of the No Weapon group. These are small scale entrepreneurs who have come to SMT/Kiva lenders, to request a loan of SLL 3,700,000.00 for the entire group, in order to invest in their respective businesses.
Tity B. is the leader of this group. Tity is married with 2 children who attend primary school. Tity sells body lotion, toothpaste, soap, Vaseline, etc. and has been doing this business for 9 years. With the help of this loan, Tity will invest in her business by buying stocks of good in large quantities, to add to her inventory at the store.
(Also included on the left of the photo, is loan officer Edna B. C., handing over the loan to the borrowers).

loan.use: Buy body lotion, toothpaste, soap, Vaseline, etc. in large quantities to add to her current stock of goods

loan.name: Las Tres Maras Group

texts.es: El grupo las 3 Maras est conformado por tres personas trabajadoras, esforzadas y emprendedoras una de ellas es Mara Mercedes L. de 55 aos quien se dedica al comercio de ropa usada desde hace tres aos. Ella trabaja con sus hijos y dos vendedoras quienes se encargan en distribuir l ropa. Su mayor meta es tener una gran tienda de ropa usada. Las otras dos integrantes son Mara de los ngeles H. vende prenda desde hace 4 aos y Mara Elena Leyla vende nacatamales y cobertoresetc.
texts.en:
The 'las 3 Maras' (Three Maras) group is made up of three hard-working, motivated and enterprising women. One of them is 55 year-old Mara Mercedes L. who has been selling used clothes for three years. She works with her children and two saleswomen who take care of distributing the clothes. Her biggest goal is to own a large, used-clothes store.
The other two members of the group are Mara de los ngeles H., who has been selling clothes for 4 years, and Mara Elena Leyla who sells tamales and bedspreads, etc.

loan.use: To buy bundles of clothes

loan.name: Alicia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal PATRON SAN SEBASTIAN; Este banco est ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac, provincia de Cusco, Departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra: Alicia; La socia tiene 23 aos de edad, la socia es conviviente, la socia tiene 1 hijo de 1 ao; la socia se dedica a cuidar a su hijito mientras su conyugue trabaja como gua local en la explanada de Sacsayhuaman, ellos tambin tienen caballos que los alquilan a los turistas para hacer un tour guiado por los complejos arqueolgicos de Sacsayhuaman, Qenqo, Pucapucara, Tambomachay; la socia apoya y ayuda a su conyugue con el cuidado, alimento y crianza de los caballos, ella tambin se encarga de dar la informacin del servicio, La socia desea el crdito para algo personal. Ella ir pagando sus cuotas con los ingresos de la renta del tour a caballo. La socia requiere el prstamo para uso personal.
La socia est feliz con el prstamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Alicia is a member of the PATRON SAN SEBASTIAN community bank which is located in Huanchac district, in Cusco province and department.
Alicia is 23 years old. She lives with her partner and has a one-year-old son. Alicia looks after her little boy while her partner works as a local guide at la explanada de Sacsayhuaman. They also own horses that they hire out to tourists so that they can enjoy guided tours of the Sacsayhuaman, Qengo, Pucapucara and Tambomachay archaeological complexes. Alicia supports and helps her partner in caring for, feeding and raising the horses. She also takes care of providing information about their service.
Alicia would like this loan for something personal. She will make her loan repayments with the income she makes from her horse tours. She requires the loan for personal use.
Alicia is happy to be receiving her loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loan.use: For personal use

loan.name: Gloria

texts.es: Gloria Esperanza C. es una mujer trabajadora, esforzada, jovial y emprendedora originaria de Managua. Esta seora de 66 aos desde muy joven se ha salido a ganarse el pan de cada da y hace dos aos que tiene una pequea venta. Ella con el crdito comprara arroz, azcar, caf, aceiteetc.
texts.en: Gloria Esperanza C. is a hard-working, pleasant, and enterprising woman from Managua. She is 66 years old and from a very young age has gone out each day to earn her daily bread. For the past two years she has had a small store. She will use the loan money to buy rice, sugar, oil, etc.

loan.use: Basic grains

loan.name: Lorenzo

texts.es: Lorenzo soltero, tiene dos hijos a los cuales los tiene estudiando, hombre trabajador, responsable tiene su negocio de venta de perfumes, talcos, colonias para caballeros, y todo encargo de productos que su clientes requieran. Lo inicio con fondos propios desde hace un tiempo es el medio con que sustenta a su familia ya que la situacin de encontrar trabajo esta escaso por tal empez a comercializar producto de variedad. Con el prstamo compra productos como. Perfumes, colonias, cremas, talcos, desodorantes, prendas de caballero, damas y nios para mantener en existencia en el momento que el cliente busque el producto. Gracias por la oportunidad de fortalecer su negoci mediante el prstamo y aumentar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Lorenzo is single and he has two children, both of whom are in school. He is a hardworking and responsible man. He has a perfume business and he sells perfumes, talc, gentlemen's colognes, and any products that his customers request.
He started out some time ago with his own funds and now it is the way he supports his family. It is difficult to find work which is why he started selling these types of products.
With his loan he will purchase products such as perfumes, colognes, skin creams, talc, deodorants, and clothing for men, women, and children. This way he will have in stock whatever products his customers are looking for. He is thankful for this opportunity to strengthen his business through this loan which will help him to increase his earnings.

loan.use: to purchase various personal care products for resale

loan.name: Amparo Del Carmen

texts.es: Amparo madre soltera, sus hijos ya son mayores de edad y le ayudan con los gastos del hogar, ella vela por que sus hijos salgan adelante. Mujer trabajadora, responsable y honesta inicio su propio negocio de ventas por catlogos y encargos fue con ahorros propios por tal compro pequeas cantidades y poco variedad. Por falta de financiamientos no inverta ms en su negocio siendo unas de las dificultades. Sus planes son aumentar su inventarios e incrementar sus venta mediante la compra de mayores cantidades y ingresar otros productos, con el prstamo comprara: bisutera, perfumes de dama, caballero y nios, tambin blusas, pantalones, talco, cremas, entre otras mercadera. Agradece a la financiera por la oportunidad de ingresar en el mundo del crdito obteniendo ganancias para ser invertido.
texts.en:
Amparo is a single mother although her children are grown and they help her with the household expenses. She prays that her children will find success. She is a hardworking woman, responsible and honest. She started her own business with her own savings selling by catalogue and taking orders. She was only able to buy in small quantities and in limited variety. Her plan is to increase her sales through the purchase of greater quantities of products and to introduce new products, including pants, talc, skin creams, and other merchandise.
She is thankful to the financial organization for the opportunity to take part in the world of personal credit in order to obtain earnings to reinvest.

loan.use: to purchase personal care products for resale

loan.name: Wilfredo Heriberto

texts.es: El Sr. Wilfredo es una persona que trabaja en una maquiladora adems de contar con un puesto de hamburguesas en su domicilio, el cual atiende personalmente los fines de semana en compaa de su esposa, con la venta de hamburguesas, burritos y toda la variedad de comida rpida que ellos producen han mejorado satisfactoriamente sus ingresos pero requieren de la compra de mercanca para que este negocio contine funcionando ya que con los ingresos de la maquiladora no les es suficiente para abastecerse de materia prima, as como tambin desean incrementar la variedad de platillos ofrecidos a sus cliente ya que consideran que de esta manera atraern a su negocio a un mayor numero de personas.
texts.en: Mr. Wilfredo works at a factory and also has a hamburger stand at his home where he works on the weekends with the help of his wife. They sell hamburgers, burritos, and all kinds of fast food that they make. Their income has increased at a nice rate but they need to buy more supplies to stay in business because the earnings from the factory are not enough to buy high-quality supplies. They also wish to offer a greater variety of dishes to their customers as they feel they will attract more people.

loan.use: To buy merchandise

loan.name: Nora Del Socorro

texts.es: Nora del Socorro O. es una mujer trabajadora, esforzada y emprendedora de 50 aos quien se dedica a la realizacin de fresco, sopa y verduras desde hace 4 aos. Ella invertir el crdito en verduras y frutas para su negocio. O. tiene tres hijos de 32, 28 y 25 aos quienes le ayudan.
texts.en: Nora del Socorro O. is a hard-working and enterprising 50 year old woman who has worked selling juices, soup, and vegetables for four years. She will use the loan to buy fruit and vegetables for her business. She has three children, ages 32, 28, and 25, who help her.

loan.use: Fruits and vegetables

loan.name: Alba Rosa

texts.es: Alba casada su esposo trabaja como guardia de seguridad, sus hijos ya son independientes juntos tiene el proyecto de mejorar la infraestructura de su vivienda, realizando mejorar y construir la parte que sean necesaria para obtener mayor comodidad y proteccin. Desde hace un tiempo ella trabaja por cuenta propia en su tortillera no ha tenido dificultades, inicio con el apoyo de su madre. El prstamo ser utilizado para la compra de materiales de construccin: cemento, arena, piedra cantera, piedrn, ladrillo, bloques, alambre de amarre y otros materiales para construir un cuarto. Obtener seguridad es la meta. Agradece por la oportunidad para mejorar su nivel de vida poco a poco.
texts.en:
Alba is married and her husband is a security guard. Her children are already independent and together they have the goal of improving their house by carrying out improvements and building a section to acquire greater comfort and safety. She has been working at her own tortilla business for some time and she has not had any difficulties. She started out with her mother's support.
This loan will be used to purchase construction materials: cement, sand, rocks, gravel, bricks, construction blocks, wire, and other materials needed to build a room. Her goal is to improve their safety. She is thankful for the opportunity to improve the quality of her life, one step at a time.

loan.use: to purchase construction materials

loan.name: Anonymous Group
loan.use: Buys drinks in bulk to add to his inventory.

loan.name: The Joy Of Cancun Group

texts.es: Este grupo se llama Alegra de Cancn porque somos mujeres que radicamos en Cancn con una actitud alegre como la ciudad. Est ubicado en Quintana Roo, en Mxico. La seora Carla Elianora P. Snchez es integrante del grupo. Tiene 26 aos y estudio una carrera tcnica en msica. Es maestra de msica. Ella se dedica a la venta de plantas de ornato. Solicita el prstamo para la compra de tierra, plantas, semillas para el crecimiento del negocio. Sus clientes opinan que las plantas que ella vende estn bien cuidadas; su atencin es amable y piensan que la venta de plantas es una actividad generosa con el medio ambiente. Al solicitar este prstamo se siente muy contenta por poder contribuir con los gastos de su familia y as salir adelante para llevar una vida ms estable. Tambin espera que la gente se anime ms en la compra de plantas para ayudar al medio ambiente y as tener un mayor ingreso para apoyar a sus papas y continuar preparndose en la msica.
texts.en: The name of this group is "The Joy of Cancun" and it was named because they are a group of women who live in Cancun and who have a happy attitude, like the city. It is located in the Quintana Roo, in Mexico. Mrs. Carla Elianora P. S. is a member of the group. She is 26 years old and she studied music. She is a music teacher. She sells ornamental plants. She requests a loan to purchase potting soil, plants, and seeds to develop her business. Her clients comment that the plants that she sells are always well cared-for. Her customer service is very kind and they think that the sale of plans is a generous activity for the environment. When she requested the loan she felt very happy to be able to contribute to the family's expenses and to support herself, to have a more stable lifestyle. She also hopes that the population will increasingly seek to buy plants to help the environment. She will have a better income to help her parents and to continue studying her career in music.

loan.use: to purchase potting soil, plants, and seeds for the development of her business

loan.name: Juan Fidencio

texts.es: El Sr. Juan Fidencio Z., es empleado de una maquiladora , es padre de dos pequeos, su casa la ha estado construyendo poco a poco, en este momento lo que desean es construir una recamara para que cuando sus hijos crezcan tengan un poco mas de privacidad, es por ello que al enterarse de esta institucin y los apoyos que se otorgan para llevar a cabo el proyecto decidi junto con su esposa visitarnos y exponernos el proyecto de vivienda que el quiere terminar, que en este caso solo le faltaba poner la losa de concreto en el techo y el quiere terminar antes de que inicie la poca de lluvia , de esta manera al ampliar su domicilio sus hijos van a contar con mayor espacio para moverse y as como tambin podrn comprar muebles que necesitan y podrn acomodarlos dentro de su domicilio ya debido al espacio tan reducido no poda ser esto posible.
texts.en: Mr. Juan Fidencio Z. works at a factory and is the father of two young children. He has been building his house little by little and currently wishes to build a bedroom so that when his children grow they will have a bit more privacy. He and his wife decided to ask for a loan from this institution and explain their construction plan and his hopes for finishing. The only thing he needs to do is to put a concrete slab on the roof and he wants to finish before the rainy season begins. After adding on to the home his children will have more space to move around. They will also be able to buy the furniture they need and they will be able to place the furniture inside their home, something they have not yet been able to do as they do not have much space.

loan.use: To build a room for concrete slabs

loan.name: Las Madres Group

texts.es: El grupo las madres lo conforman tres mujeres trabajadoras, esforzadas y emprendedoras una de ellas es Darling del Socorro Dvila de 30 aos quien se dedica al comercio de anteojos de sol y accesorios para celulares (carcasas, auriculares, etc.) Ella tiene cuatro hijos de 11, 10 y 9 amos y un bebe de 8 meses. Las otras integrantes del grupo son Ftima del Socorro Mndez de 21aos vende cosmticos y perfumes y Martha Isabel P. se dedica al comercio de pelculas hace 2 aos.
texts.en:
The group The Mothers is made up of three hard-working and enterprising women. One of them is Darling del Socorro D., 30, who has a sunglass and cell phone accessory (frames,earphones, etc.) business. She has four children: 11, 10, 9 and an 8-month old baby.
The other members of the group are Ftima del Socorro Mndez, 21, who sells cosmetics and perfumes, and Martha Isabel P. who has had a movie rental business for the past two years.

loan.use: Sunglass and cell phone accessories

loan.name: Hosanna Jabneel

texts.es: La Sra. Hosanna y su esposo, radican en una colonia muy retirada de la ciudad , como los dos trabajan dejan sola la casa donde habitan y aunque confan en los vecinos no descartan la idea de que los ladrones puedan atacar su hogar en cualquier momento, es por eso que ellos han decidido construir una barda al frente del domicilio para mayor seguridad y as tener confianza al momento en que ellos se retiran a su trabajo adems de que pronto recibirn la llegada de su bebe para el cual quieren la mayor proteccin y seguridad, para que en un futuro el pueda salir a jugar al patio sin ningn problema es por ello que este crdito representa su segundo refinanciamiento y estn muy contentos con esta institucin ya que se sienten apoyados para poder llevar a cabo sus proyectos.
texts.en:
Seora Hosanna and her husband live in a suburb far from the city. They both work from home and even though they trust their neighbors, they don't dismiss the idea that thieves could break into their home at any time. For this reason they have decided to build a fence in front of their house so that they can feel safer when they are working. They are also expecting a baby soon and they want to protect and keep their child safe and, in the future, be able to play on the patio without any problems.
This is their second loan and they are very happy with the institution and the support that they provide to help them carry out their projects.

loan.use: To build a fence

loan.name: Alice

texts.fr:
Cliente ge de 44ans et mre dun enfant, elle a sa charge 7 orphelins de sa dfunte sur.
Elle ouvre le restaurant spcialit MABOKE en 2004 vente de poisson d'eau douce cuit dans les feuilles de maniocs a l'etoufee sur un barbecue. Avec le prt qu'elle va recevoir, elle va acheter des cuvettes de poissons d'eau douce comme la silure, l'anguille et les carpes, bidon d'huile de 25l, filet d'oignon, les feuilles d'attache, poivre blanc , piment..
Ses ventes journalire sont de 30.000F a 80.000 par jour et ses clients les chauffeurs et les vendeurs du marche.
Tres entreprenante , elle veut continuer dans cet lan pour faire plus des benefices afin de soutenir ses neveux dans leurs tudes et amliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille.
texts.en:
This customer is 44 years old and the mother of one child. She also has seven orphaned children of her deceased sister in her care. She opened a specialty restaurant named Maboke in 2004, where she serves freshwater fish steamed in manioc leaves on a barbecue.
With this loan she would like to buy freshwater fish such as catfish, eel and carp, a 25-liter jug of oil, a bag of onions, leaves for wrapping, white pepper, hot pepper Her daily receipts range from 30,000 to 80,000 francs, and her customers are drivers and market vendors. Very enterprising, she would like to use this momentum to increase her income in order to be able to help her nephews pay for their studies and to improve the life conditions of her family.

loan.use: Purchasing freshwater fish, oil, carbon, condiments, and household items

loan.name: Vanessa Isadora

texts.es: Vannessa casada su esposo trabaja para una empresa de electricidad, tienes dos hijos por los cuales su meta que sean profesionales. Mujer trabajadora y emprendedora inicio su negocio propio de venta de productos cosmticos, bisutera obteniendo una entrada econmica extra apoyando a su esposo con los gastos del hogar. Con fondos propios inicio a comprar cantidades pequeas solo por encargos. Proyeccin de un aumento de ventas para estos meses y a corto plazo mejora su vivienda. El prstamo era invertido en la compra de materiales de construccin como: cemento, perlines, arena, lminas de aluminio, piedras canteras, varillas de cobres, entre otros materiales para construir un porche en su casa obteniendo comodidad.
texts.en:
Vannessa is married, and her husband works for an electricity company. She has two children, and her goal for them is that they become professionals.
She is a hard-working and entrepreneurial woman. She started her own business of selling cosmetic products and costume jewelry. This gives her entry to extra financial support to help her husband with the household expenses.
With her own funds she started to buy small quantities only by order. Her plan is to increase sales during the coming months. Her short term plan is to improve her house.
She used the loan to buy construction materials like cement, beams, sand, aluminum sheeting, quarry rocks, and copper rebar, among other materials. These materials are to build a porch onto her house in order to be more comfortable.

loan.use: to buy construction materials to make improvements on her house

loan.name: Mariposas Monarcas Group

texts.es: La Sra. Georgina Danae C. M. es integrante del grupo Mariposas Monarcas, vive en el estado de Quintana Roo en playa del Carmen. En Mxico. Tiene 24 aos de edad trmino su primaria, es ama de casa y tiene un hijo de 4 aos de edad. Solicita el prstamo para comprar ms productos de belleza y con las ventas y la ganancia que obtenga ella puede comprarle a su hijo sus tiles escolares y lo que necesite. Sus clientes dicen que le compran mayormente a ella por que el precio es accesible. Al solicitar el prstamo ella est muy feliz y contenta porque va a invertir ms productos que le generan ingresos con lo que puede ofrecerles una mejor vida a su hijo as como una carrera profesional para que salga adelante y logr lo sus sueos. Observaciones, la seora que no se ve bien se llama Maria apolonia.
texts.en:
Georgina Danae C. M. is a member of the Mariposas Monarcas (Monarch Butterflies) group and lives in Playa del Carmen, in the state of Quintana Roo, in Mexico. Georgina is 24 years old and finished her elementary school education. She is a housewife and has a 4 year-old son.
Georgina is requesting this loan to buy more beauty products. She will use her sales and the profits she makes from them to buy her son his school supplies and other things he needs. Georgina's customers say that they buy mainly from her because her prices are affordable. At the time of requesting this loan, Georgina is very happy and content because she will invest in buying more products that will make her more profits. This will enable her to offer her son a better life as well as a university-level education so that he can get ahead in life and fulfil his dreams.
nb: the lady who can't B. seen very well is called Maria Apolonia.

loan.use: to buy more beauty products

loan.name: Ta-Kuru Group

texts.en:
Pictured here are members of the Ta-Kuru group from northern Sierra Leone. They run small businesses and have come to SMT, a partner of Kiva, in order to seek their first loan. With this loan, they will be able to add more goods to their businesses, attract more customers, make more sales and profit and consequently improve on their living conditions.
The leader of this group of entrepreneurs is Mariatu B.. She was born in the village of Marampa 28 years ago. She is married and has 2 children. Her husband is a trader and her children are in primary school. Mariatu has been selling cooked bulgur wheat for 5 years now. With her share of this loan, she will buy cooking materials like bulgur wheat, oil, fish, margi, onions, etc. in order to cook a large quantity of bulgur for sale.

loan.use: Buy cooking ingredients like bulgur wheat, oil, fish, margi, onions, etc. in order to cook a large quantity of bulgur for sale

loan.name: Nana

texts.en:
This is 39 year-old Nana S.. She is married and has 2 children aged 5 and 9 years. She has 1 additional dependent, who she adopted. In 2004, Nana S. established her plastic utensils business. She began her business because she wanted to be financially self reliant.

Working 6 days a week and 9 hours a day, she earns about Le 2,800,000 every month from this business. She would like a loan of Le 4,000,000. With the loan she will purchase more plastic bowls. Nana hopes that this loan will enable her to increase her monthly profits by approximately Le 600,000. In the future, Nana S. plans to purchase enough stock to reduce frequent traveling to Guinea for purchases. She thanks you for your support.

loan.use: To buy more household plastic utensils

loan.name: Las Damas 96 Group

texts.es: Este grupo se llama Las Damas 96, porque se consideran unas damas de esta ciudad hermosa que est Ubicado en el estado de Quintana Roo, Cancn en Mxico. El grupo est conformado por 12 integrantes. La seora Lidia Aurora C. E., es la presidenta del grupo. Tiene 46 aos, estudio hasta el segundo grado de primaria, es ama de casa, tiene 3 hijos varones de 23, 20 y 10 aos de edad. Ella se dedica a la venta y elaboracin de piatas que inicio desde hace 20 aos. En el cual requiere el crdito para comprar material para la elaboracin de piatas y as poder seguir con sus ventas diarias. La seora va de negocio a negocio promoviendo las piatas y as poder captar clientes y poder venderles las piatas por cantidades que le soliciten de igual manera poderles dar un mejor servicio a sus clientes. Doa Lidia se siente muy motivada y contenta con el crdito que se le otorgo porque con este ella podr apoyar en los gastos de su familia y poderles dar a su familia una vida de calidad. Observaciones, las seoras que no se ve bien se llama Minerva C. y Guadalupe C..
texts.en:
This group is called 'Las Damas 96' (Ladies 96) because they are women from the beautiful town of Cancn, in the State of Quintana Roo, in Mexico. The group has 12 members.
Lidia Aurora C. E. is the group's president. She is 46 years old and studied up to the second grade of elementary school. She has three sons aged 23, 20 and 10. Lidia's business is making and selling piatas. She started this business 20 years ago. Lidia needs this loan to buy materials for making her piatas so that she can continue making her daily sales. She goes from business to business promoting her piatas in order to attract customers and sell them piatas in the quantity they require. She also strives to provide her customers with a better service.
Lidia feels very motivated by the loan that she has been awarded and very happy because it will enable her to support her family's expenses and allow her to provide her family with a better quality of life.
nb: the ladies who cannot be seen very well are Minerva C. and Guadalupe C..

loan.use: to buy materials for making piatas

loan.name: Diana Yadira

texts.es: La Sra. Diana Yadira tiene un negocio, en esta ocasin necesita comprar mercanca para su local ya que tiene una gran cantidad de pedidos de sus clientes y siempre se a caracterizado por brindarles un excelente servicio, nos comenta que de esta manera mejorara su economa adems de atraer a un mayor numero de clientes as como tambin con estos ingresos podr ofrecerles una mejor calidad de vida a sus tres hijos.
texts.en: Sra. Diana Yadira manages a business. On this occasion, she needs to buy merchandise for her shop since she has a large number of orders from her customers. Diana is always known for providing excellent service. She says that by working in this manner she is able to improve her finances. Attracting a large number of customers also helps to generate income so that she can provide a better quality of life for her three children.

loan.use: Purchase merchandise

loan.name: Olivia

texts.es: La seora Olivia tiene un negocio de venta de bateras, en este momento ella desea comprar bateras para maquinaria pesada ya que por el momento solo vende este producto para carros y camionetas, solicita este crdito ya que representa una manera en la que puede generar mayores ingresos adems de atraer a un gran numero de clientes ya que este producto es muy demandado en su negocio.
texts.en:
Sra. Olivia has a business selling batteries. At the moment, she only sells batteries for cars and trucks, but she also wants to sell batteries for heavy machinery.

She is requesting this loan because it will help her generate more income and attract a large number of customers since her business experiences high demand for these products.

loan.use: Purchase an assortment of batteries to sell

loan.name: Martha

texts.es: Martha Patricia G. Prez es una mujer trabajadora, esforzada de 37 aos ella desde hace 5 aos tiene una pequea pulpera la cual inicio con la venta de chivera, adems vende licor sellado. Ella invertir el crdito en granos bsicos, carne y licor.
texts.en:
Martha Patricia G. Prez, age 37, is a hardworking and determined woman. She has managed a small store for five years. Martha started out selling yogurt and then liquor.

She will invest her loan in basic grains, meat, and liquor.

loan.use: Purchase basic grains, meat, and liquor to sell in her store

loan.name: Doris Tatiana

texts.es: Doris Tatiana tiene una pequea pulpera ubicada en su casa de habitacin, tiene 35 aos de edad, es madre soltera y posee 3 hijos. Esta no es la primera vez que solicita crditos por lo que se siente muy agradecida con este medio de vida. De lo que obtiene de su negocio lo utiliza para comprar ms mercanca y realizar su venta ms das a la semana, para que mejor sea sus ingresos y con ello cubrir algunos gastos que se generan en su hogar. el crdito ser invertido en la compra de granos bsicos, golosinas, refrescos naturales y pan.
texts.en:
Doris Tatiana has a small store that she manages in her home. She is 35 years old and a single mother of three children. This is not the first time she has applied for loans since she is grateful that they have helped her earn a living. What she earns from her business is used to buy more merchandise so that she can generate more sales throughout the week. This enables her to improve her income and cover some of the household expenses.

The loan will be invested in the purchase of basic grains, candy, natural beverages, and bread.

loan.use: Operating capital to buy basic grains, candy, natural beverages, and bread

loan.name: Flora

texts.es: Flora Marina P. es una fmina trabajadora, esforzada y emprendedora quien tiene una pequea tortillera desde hace 4 aos. Ella echa tortillas por las maanas, al medio da y por las tardes ya que es un bastimento bsico en la alimentacin. Ella suea con superarse y seguir adelante.
texts.en: Flora Marina P. is a hardworking, determined, and enterprising woman. She has managed a small business selling tortillas for the past four years. Flora makes tortillas in the mornings, at noon, and in the afternoons since they are a basic food product. Her dream is to succeed and move forward.

loan.use: Purchase corn

loan.name: Jovany

texts.en:
After working for years for larger janitorial companies, Claudia and Jovany realized that they had the experience, expertise, and determination they needed to go into business for themselves. Whats more, by starting their own small business, they would have the power to make their own decisions about the type of work they do and would be able to keep more of their earnings each month.
Over the last three years Claudia and Jovanys business has steadily grown to take on more cleaning contracts, thanks to their hard work and dedication to customer satisfaction. To take their business to the next level, the couple needed new equipment but the upfront investment was more than they can afford on their own.
A $5,000 microloan, the couples first from Opportunity Fund, will enable Claudia and Jovany to purchase a new power cleaner. This machine will do three jobs at once! explained Jovany. By automating part of the cleaning process that Claudia and Jovany currently do by hand, this machine will dramatically increase their efficiency and improve the services they can offer to their clients.

loan.use: New equipment for his cleaning business

loan.name: Walter Marcelino

texts.es: Walter, es originario de Palacaguina una pequea comarca del Departamento de Madriz , tiene 30 aos de edad , es soltero , de oficio ,tiene un hijo de 9 aos el cual esta estudiando cuarto grado de primaria, lleva 5 aos trabajando el rea de elaboracin de puertas y ventanas de vidrio y aluminio . Empez en esta actividad al salir de su quinto ao de la secundaria, debido a que no tenia como pagar una carrera universitaria , tuvo que salir de Palacaguina en busca de trabajo y se fue a Estel ,estando ah y con ayuda de un primo logro aprender a trabajar en un taller de vidrio y aluminio donde empez como ayudante , a los tres aos de estar en ese taller logro especializarse hasta ser el que entrenaba a otros jvenes y adquiri mas pedidos de puertas y ventanas de vidrio al cumplir 5 aos en ese taller decidi independizarse y comenz a trabajar por si solo . Poco a poco fue comprando herramientas de trabajo gracias a los pedidos que reciba. En este negocio solo el lo atiende cuando tiene pedidos grandes busca ayudantes para que lo ayuden a cumplir con lo pedidos que le llegan as tambin el mismo sale fuera de su comarca en busca de nuevos clientes. Solicita el crdito para compra de materia prima como aluminio, tornillo de cabezal y herramientas de trabajo. Pues le ayudara a facilitar su trabajo en cuanto entrega de pedidos, a darle un mejor acabado a las puertas y ventanas que haces as mismo hacer nuevos clientes. Tiene como planes futuros poder tener su propio local y ambientarlo con buenas y modernas herramientas de trabajo y poder contratar personas fijas. Dentro de su metas prximas esta adquirir suficientes materiales de trabajo para sacar pedidos grandes que le salgan, tener una cuenta de ahorro donde asegure una buena educacin para su hijo, ya que el no pudo estudiar pero su hijo tiene la fe que el si lo lograra, tambin le gustara tener su vehculo donde pueda transportar su pedidos y herramientas de trabajo para agilizarlos mas rpidamente.
texts.en:
Walter is originally from Palacaguina, a small region in the Department of Madriz. He is 30 years old, single, employed, and has a 9 year old son who is in the fourth grade. For the past five years, Walter has been making doors and windows out of glass and aluminum.

Walter started working in this trade after he completed his fifth year of secondary school since he had no other way of paying for a university degree. He left Palacaguina to find work and went to Estel. A cousin helped him out by offering him an apprenticeship at a glass and aluminum workshop where he started out as an assistant. Three years later, he was able to teach other young people since there were more orders for doors and windows. Once he worked five years at the workshop, Walter decided to become independent and start working alone. Over time he was able to buy tools with the income from the orders he received. Whenever he receives large orders, Walter will find assistants to help him complete the work. He also travels outside of the region to look for new customers.

The loan he is requesting will be used to buy materials such as aluminum, screws, and tools for his job. This will help facilitate his work so that he can complete his orders and provide better quality finishes to the doors and windows that he produces. As a result, he will be able to attract new customers. Walter has future plans to open his own shop and furnish it with modern equipment of high quality, as well as hire permanent employees.

His immediate goals are to acquire sufficient materials to complete the large orders he has received. Walter has money saved up to secure a good education for his son since he was not able to continue his own education. He has faith that his son will be able to accomplish this. In addition, Walter would like to have a vehicle to help him deliver orders and transport equipment more quickly.

loan.use: To purchase materials and tools for making windows and doors.

loan.name: Elizabeth

texts.es: La seora Elizabeth, es socia del banco comunal Sol Naciente, del Distrito de Calleria, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 62 aos de edad, madre soltera y tiene 5 hijos. Ella se dedica a la venta de productos comestibles, esta actividad la raliza en las afueras de su domicilio y tiene la ayuda de una de sus hijas, lleva trabajando con Manuela Ramos desde hace 9 aos. Con este prstamo de S/. 1,000.00 nuevos soles comprar 10 kilos de pescado seco, 3 kilos de faria, 2 racimos de pltano, 2 kilos de tomate, 2 kilos de cebolla, 5 kilos de papa, 1 kilo de ajos, 1 atado de culantro de la regin, 1 lata de pan, 1 lata de biscocho, 1 caja de galleta, 1 paquete de papel higinico, caja de leche chica, caja de aceite, 1 caja de mantequilla. Con todos los prstamos que ha tenido de Manuela Ramos ha ido incrementando su pequeo negocio, las ganancias las utiliza para pagar las cuotas al banco y tambin le alcanza para darse unos pequeos gustos.
texts.en:
Sra. Elizabeth is a member of the Communal Bank Sol Naciente (Rising Sun) which is in the District of Calleria, Department of Ucayali. She is 62 years old and a single mother of five children.

Elizabeth sells food products. Her business is located just outside of her home and she has the help of one of her daughters.

Elizabeth has been working with Manuela Ramos for nine years. With this loan of 1000 PEN, she will buy 10 kilos of dried fish, 3 kilos of flour, 2 bunches of bananas, 2 kilos of tomatoes, 2 kilos of onions, 5 kilos of potatoes, 1 kilo of garlic, 1 bunch of cilantro grown in the region, 1 case of bread, 1 case of biscuits, 1 package of cookies, 1 packet of toilet paper, case of milk, case of oil, and 1 case of butter.

With the loans from Manuela Ramos, Elizabeth has been able to steadily increase her small business. The profits she earns are used to repay her loans to the Communal Bank and purchase a few small luxuries for herself that she can afford.

loan.use: To purchase various products for her business.

loan.name: Maria Isabel

texts.es: La joven Maria Isabel de 25 aos, reside en tejera un municipio del sauce. Vive con su esposo y un hijo que depende econmicamente de ella. Maria Isabel administra una pulpera hace 2 aos, por iniciativa propia, trabajando de lunes a domingo, no tiene un horario de venta pues la tiene en su propia casa. Ella est solicitando un prstamo para invertir en este negocio, comprando arroz, frijol, azcar, aceite, sopas, verduras, pollo, bebidas entre otros que a diario vende a sus clientes. Esto le ayudara a fortalecer el negocio ya que lograra abastecerlo de todo lo necesario en el hogar, ya que son los ms demandados por los clientes. Sus aspiraciones es continuar aumentando el negocio, que su hijo termine sus estudios para que opte por un futuro ms estable.
texts.en:
Maria Isabel is a young woman who is 25 years of age and resides in the weaving community of El Sauce. She lives with her husband and a son who is financially dependent on her. Maria Isabel has been managing a store that she started on her own for the past two years. She works Monday through Sunday, but she does not have a set schedule since the store is in her home.

Maria Isabel is requesting a loan to invest in her business. She will buy rice, beans, sugar, oil, soups, vegetables, chicken, beverages, and other products that she sells to her customers on a daily basis. With this support, she will be able to strengthen her business and restock her inventory with all of the household necessities that her customers demand. Her aspirations include continuing to grow her business and seeing her son finish his studies so that he can have a more stable future.

loan.use: To purchase rice, beans, sugar, oil, soups, vegetables, chicken, beverages, and other products.

loan.name: Jehova Jirex Group

texts.es: El grupo Jehova Jirex lo conforman tres mujeres trabajadoras una de ellas es la seora Lorena del Carmen S. de 55 aos se dedica a la costura desde hace 3 aos. Ella inicio vendiendo verduras y frutas, luego CD y ahora est en la costura. Ella invertir el crdito en telas y su mayor sueo es tener un taller de moda con todas las condiciones. Las otras integrantes del grupo son Ivania Leticia M. quien vende fritanga y Mara Justina Rocha quien vende comida.
texts.en:
The group Jehova Jirex consists of three hardworking women. One of them is Sra. Lorena del Carmen S.. She is 55 years old and has worked as a seamstress for three years. Lorena started out selling vegetables and fruits, and later CDs, but now she is a seamstress.

She will invest her loan in fabrics. Her greatest wish is to have a sewing workshop in good condition.

The other members of the group are Ivania Leticia M., who sells fried foods, and Mara Justina Rocha who sells food.

loan.use: Purchase fabrics

loan.name: Carla Jimena

texts.es: La seora Carla es socia del banco comunal Las innovadoras del Distrito de Calleria, Departamento de Ucayali. Tiene 34 aos de edad, est casada y tiene 3 hijos menores de edad. Su esposo es polica. Lleva recin 2 aos perteneciendo al banco comunal, hace un par de meses que alquil dos puestos en el mercado numero 2 de la ciudad para poner su tienda de ropas, anteriormente venda su ropa en su propia casa. Con su nuevo prstamo de S/. 1,200.00 nuevos soles comprar 2 maniqus, doc. De pantalones para damas, 6 vestidos, faldas, 10 blusas, 6 polos para damas, 6 polos para nios, 3 vestidos para fiesta. Espera que le vaya bien y tenga para poder seguir trabajando y as dar una mejor educacin a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Sra. Carla is a member of the Communal Bank Las Innovadoras (The Innovators) in the District of Calleria, Department of Ucayali. She is 34 years old, married, and has three young children. Her husband is a policeman. Carla joined the Communal Bank two years ago. Two months ago, she rented two stalls at the Number 2 Market in the city where she has established a clothing shop. Carla previously sold clothes out of her home.

With her new loan of 1200 PEN, Carla will buy two mannequins, a half dozen womens trousers, six dresses, skirts, ten blouses, six womens polo shirts, six childrens polo shirts, and three party dresses. Carla expects to do well and keep working so that she can provide her children a good education.

loan.use: Purchase two mannequins, a half dozen womens trousers, six dresses, skirts, ten blouses, six womens polo shirts, six childrens polo shirts, and three party dresses

loan.name: Los ngeles De Charlies Group

texts.es: El grupo los ngeles de Charlies lo conforman tres mujeres trabajadoras, esforzadas y emprendedoras una de ella es Karla J. de 40 aos quien se dedica a la venta de comida. Ella realiza la comida, las empaca y entregara en las empresas. Giron tiene tres hijos de 20, 15 y 10 aos por los cuales trabaja arduamente. Las integrantes de los grupos son Gloria Q. de 31 aos quien tiene una pulpera desde hace 4 aos y Raquel G. de 51 aos quien vende tortilla, gaseosa, licor y cerveza.
texts.en:
The Charlie's Angels group is made up of 3 hard-working, enterprising women. One of whom is Karla J. who is 40 years old and sells food. She makes the food, packages it, and sells it to businesses.
J. has 3 children who are 20, 15, and 10 years old, each of whom also works hard.
The other group members are Gloria Q. (31 years old) who has run a small general store for the past 4 years, and Raquel G. (51 years old) who sells tortillas, soft drinks, liquor, and beer.

loan.use: Purchase basic grains, meat, etc.

loan.name: Bertha Caldern Group

texts.es: El grupo Bertha Caldern est conformado por tres mujeres trabajadoras, esforzadas y emprendedoras una de ellas es Karla G. de 38 aos quien vende frijoles, hielo y gaseosa desde hace 2 aos. Ella con crdito adems de comprar productos desea invertir en sandalias. Las otra integrantes del grupo son Mariela de los ngeles A. Prez quien tiene una pequea venta de chiveria y gaseosa y Martha Lorena T. vende frijoles cocidos, lea y productos arabella.
texts.en: The Bertha Calderon group is made up of 3 hard-working, enterprising women, one of whom is Karla G. who is 38 years old and has sold beans, ice, and soft drinks for the past 2 years. She would like to use the loan to buy other products to sell like sandals. The other group members are Mariela de los Angeles A. Perez who runs a small general store selling food and soft drinks and Martha Lorena T. who sells beans, firewood and beauty products.

loan.use: Purchase sandals to sell

loan.name: Fortaleza Group

texts.es: El grupo Fortaleza lo conforman tres mujeres trabajadoras, esforzadas y emprendedoras una de ellas es Juliana E. de 56 aos que se dedica al comercio en general es decir vende de todo lo que le encargan. Ella tiene cinco hijos mayores e invertir el crdito en su negocio. Las otras integrantes son Yamileth del Socorro Velzquez de 39 aos quien vende de todo un poco y Griselda del Socorro Narvaes vende cosmticos y joyas.
texts.en:
The Fortaleza group consists of 3 hard-working, enterprising women, one of whom is Juliana E. who is 56 years old and is a saleswoman. She has 5 adult children and she plans to invest the loan in her sales business.
The other group members are Yamileth del Socorro Velazquez who is 39 years old and sells a little bit of everything and Griselda del Socorro N. who sells cosmetics and jewelry.

loan.use: Purchase various merchandise for sale

loan.name: Nestor

texts.es: Nstor tiene 31 aos, su actividad econmica es la compra y venta de cerdo. Esta actividad es muy popular en nuestro pas, pues la mayora de las personas tienen este medio de vida para sobrevivir. Hace ms de 10 aos, que se dedica a este negocio cuando dio inicio fue por su familia, pues anteriormente su mama se haca cargo, fue as que Nstor aprendi de este negocio por tal razn l decide establecer su propio negocio en su vivienda. El solicita este financiamiento para la compra de cerdos. Desea construir 2 cuartos en su vivienda.
texts.en: Nstor is 31 years old. He buys and sells pigs. This type of business is very popular in our country, because most people utilize this as a way of surviving. He started in this business 10 years ago when he got the idea from his family . His mother used to do this, and thats how Nstor learned the business and why he decided to establish his own business at his house. He is requesting this loan to buy to pigs. He would like to build two rooms onto his house.

loan.use: Working capital to buy pigs

loan.name: Las Emprendedoras Group

texts.es:
LAS EMPRENDEDORAS es un grupo formado por 10 socios la mayora de ellos viven en puente piedra un lugar al norte de Lima que se caracteriza por su gente trabajadora y emprendedora, el Sr. Roque es una clara muestra de ello ya que por mucho tiempo se dedica al negocio de la panadera y pastelera el se dedica a preparar todo tipo de pasteles y los reparte a sus clientes que ha ganado en todo este tiempo, el negocio de la panadera tiene pocas muy buenas por ejemplo en fiestas prepara panetones y turrones lo que le deja buenas ganancias cuando la temporada baja se dedica al transporte urbano ya que con sus ahorros pudo comprar una combi para hacer transporte urbano esto le permite otra entrada mas para darle lo mejor a su familia, mas adelante quiere invertir en un negocio que aun esta en proyecto ahora usara su prstamo para comprar insumos de panadera como harina, azcar y levaduras el Sr. Roque quiere seguir avanzando y crecer en lo que a su negocio se refiere.
* El Sr.Roque es el 7mo, esta vestido con camisa a cuadros.
texts.en:
LAS EMPRENDEDORAS is a group made up of 10 members. The majority of them live in Puente Piedra, a district to the north of Lima that is characterized by its hard-working and enterprising people.
Senor Roque is a good example since he spends most of his time working in his bakery and pastry shop. Here he prepares all types of pastries that he sells to the customers that he has earned over time. The bakery has good times. For example, for parties he prepares panetones [a type of sweet bread] and turrones [a traditional Peruvian dessert] which bring in a decent income. During the low season he works in urban transportation because with his savings he was able to buy a combi (microbus). This gives him access to another way to make money so that he can give his family the best. Later he wants to invest in another business that is still in the early draft stages. Right now he will use the loan to purchase items for his bakery such as flour, sugar and yeast.
Seor Roque wants to continue advancing and growing his current business. *Seor Roque is the seventh person in the picture and is wearing the plaid shirt.

loan.use: To purchase flour, sugar and yeast

loan.name: Las Exitosas Group

texts.es:
Sandra se siente muy feliz porque pudo concretar lo que tanto ansiaba tener su propio negocio fue su hermana quien la animo a realizar su sueo, despus de verla trabajar en las calles informalmente lo cual implicaba dejar a sus hijos solos y muchos riesgos en las calles, es as que empezaron habilitando un lugar en su misma casa para poner el negocio en su bazar ofrecen todo tipo de prendas de vestir y accesorios para damas, nios y caballeros . Por la variedad que ofrecen y la facilidad de pago han logrado ganar clientela y esperan seguir creciendo, en la actualidad esta inmersa en la campaa escolar, su prstamo lo va a invertir en la compra de uniformes escolares como chompas, camisas, blusas, medias, pantalones y faldas. Para mas adelante esta pensando incorporar la venta de zapatos, gracias a su trabajo es que ella puede ayudar en la manutencin del hogar, por otro lado pertenecer al grupo LAS EXITOSAS le da la oportunidad de seguir creciendo actualmente es la secretaria del grupo que esta formado por 07 socias.
* Sandra es la tercera de las paradas.
texts.en:
Sandra feels very happy for finally obtaining what she always longed for: her own business. Her sister encouraged her to fulfill her dreams after seeing her work informally selling items in the streets which forced her to leave her children and run the risk of working in the streets. They began making the arrangement to run a small store out of their own home; they offer all types of clothing and accessories for men, women and children. Due to the variety of goods they offer and the good prices, they have earned a loyal clientele and they hope to continue growing. Right now, the school year is beginning so she needs this loan to buy school uniforms like sweaters, shirts, blouses, socks, pants and skirts. In the future, she would like to begin selling shoes. Thanks to the earnings from her store, she helps to pay for the household expenses. She belongs to and is the secretary of the Las Exitosas group, made up of 7 women.
* Sandra is the 3 woman standing

loan.use: COMPRA DE UNIFORMES ESCOLARES

loan.name: Rene

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal PATRON SAN SEBASTIAN; Este banco est ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac, provincia de Cusco, Departamento de Cusco.
El socio es el Sr: Rene; El socio tiene 48 aos de edad, el socio es casado, el socio trabaja en el I.N.C (Instituto Nacional de Cultura), y tambin tiene un taller de carpintera, el socio tiene este taller porque es su pasin; el socio tiene 2 hijos; el socio desea en esta oportunidad el crdito para invertir en la carpintera y poder comprar una maquinaria para la carpintera. el socio requiere el prstamo para uso personal.
El socio est feliz con el prstamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Rene belongs to the Patron San Sebastian village bank, located in the Huanchac district of Cusco, Peru.
Rene is 48 years old, married, and works in the National Institute of Culture; he also runs a small carpentry shop which is his passion. He has 2 children. He would like to use this loan to invest in his carpentry workshop and buy machinery for it. This is for her own personal use.
He is happy for the opportunity to receive this loan and he promises to make his payments on time.

loan.use: Personal use

loan.name: Bolivia Group

texts.es: El Banco comunal BOLIVIA, en su Secuencia 13, est formado por 10 clientes, la mayora D. las socias pertenecen a la Zona D. Pampahasi, que estn ubicados por los alrededores D. la oficina D. Emprender las socias se dedican a la venta D. diversos productos como ser, D. ropa, carteras, cosmticos, venta D. comida. En la secuencia anterior todas cancelaron a excepcin D. dos socias que pagaron con sus ahorros debido que Yolanda Socia que asume el cargo D. presidenta del banco, se dedica a la venta D. pescado en la misma zona cuenta esta actividad hace 10 aos, el prstamo esta destinado a incrementar su capital, comprando productos para su venta. Casada con el seor Nstor tiene tres hijos. Asimismo, la socia Yolanda nos cuenta que, cuando ingreso a Emprender el muro D. su casa se estaba por caer, y con los crditos D. emprender realizo el arreglo D. su vivienda el cual ella esta agradecida. Es una D. las representantes en su banco comunal, que ha sido elegida para el cargo por su responsabilidad que ha demostrado dentro del banco como garante y como compaera D. grupo. Nadia, es elegida como tesorera, se dedica a la confeccin y venta D. ropa. El prstamo esta destinado para incrementar su capital. Soltera tiene un hijo, vive con sus familiares en la zona D. Pampahasi. Su meta es tener su propia microempresa y realizar sus ventas al por mayor. Juan es elegido como tesorero es una persona bastante responsable ayuda a su madre con los gastos D. la casa el trabaja el es un joven soltero trabaja como chofer con la movilidad D. su mama con el dinero del credito realizara el mantenimiento D. su movilidad. Todas las socias son personas responsables y trabajadoras que en muchos casos sacan adelante a sus familias solas, estn agradecidos con la institucin por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
The Bolivia village bank is in its 13 phase and is maD. up of 10 partners. Most of the partners live in the Pampahasi area which is located close to the Emprender office. The partners sell varoius products such as clothing, wallets, cosmetics, food, etc. In the prior phase, all of the members paid back their debt except for 2 who paid with their savings. Yolanda has become the new president of the group; she has sold fish in the area for the past 10 years. The loan will be used to increase their working capital, buying more products for them to sell. Yolanda is married to Nestor with whom she has 3 children. When she started working with Emprender, the walls of her home were about to fall down, but with the loans she received, she was able to fix her home and she is grateful for that.
She was elected president because she has shown responsibility in the group as both the treasurer and a group member.
Nadia has been elected treasurer; she works making and selling clothing. She will use the loan to increase her working capital. She is single but has a son; she lives with her relatives in the Pampahasi area. Her goal is to run her own small business and become a wholesaler.
Juan was also elected treasurer and is a very responsible person; he helps his mother with the household expenses. He works driving the car that his mother owns. He will use money from the loan to do maintenance on the car.
All the group members are very responsible people who work hard; many of them are the only source of income for their families. They are grateful for the support they are receiving.

loan.use: Increase working capital

loan.name: Carla

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal PATRON SAN SEBASTIAN; Este banco est ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac, provincia de Cusco, Departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra: Carla; La socia tiene 45 aos de edad, la socia es casada, la socia trabaja en el gobierno regional como personal administrativo y paralelamente a esto ella vende los productos de la empresa Omnilife, ella nos comenta que dicha empresa es de salud y y producen sustancias alimenticias, la socia nos comenta que los productos de esta empresa son muy cotizados por el pblico, la socia desea el crdito para invertir en la compra de productos de esta empresa y seguir vendiendo.
La socia est feliz con el prstamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Carla belongs to the Patron San Sebastian Communal Bank, which is located in the district of Huanchac, in the province of Cusco, in the department of Cusco.
Carla is 45 years old, married and works for the regional government as an administrative assistant. She also sells products made by Omnilife, a health food company that makes nutritional supplements. Carla says that the companys products are very popular. She wants the loan to buy Omnilife products for her to continue selling.
She is happy with the provided loan and is committed to making her payments on time.

loan.use: Purchase of nutritional supplements

loan.name: Ana Maria

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal PATRON SAN SEBASTIAN; Este banco est ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac, provincia de Cusco, Departamento de Cusco.
