Her husband is a teacher in a school in the area and together they work as they await the baby that is in route in order to give it all it needs.

loan.use: Purchase a used motorcar

loan.name: Katy Margoth

texts.es: La seora Margot (as la llaman), es socia del banco comunal La Lupuna, del Distrito de Manantay, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 32 aos de edad, est casada y tiene 4 hijos, lleva trabajando con los prstamos de Manuela Ramos desde hace 3 aos. Se dedica a la compra y venta de pescado salado, que compra de los botes para despus venderlos en el almacn que se encuentra cerca al puerto de Pucallpa. De esa manera est haciendo crecer su capital de trabajo y puede ayudar a su esposo con algunos gastos que hay en su hogar. Con su nuevo prstamo de S/.1,800.00 nuevos soles comprar un saco de pescado huasaco, un saco de pescado bocachico, y un saco de pescado maparate. Los prstamos de Manuela Ramos le ha servido para comenzar con su negocio y poder as ayudar a su esposo con parte de los gastos de la casa y poder vivir cmodamente, sin tener ms preocupaciones.
texts.en: Mrs. Margot (as she is known) is a member of the La Lupuna communal bank in Manantay District in the Department of Ucayali. She is 32 years old and is married with 4 children. She has worked with loans from Manuela Ramos for the past 3 years. Margot works buying and selling salted fish. She buys from the boats and then sells the fish at the wholesale market close to the port of Pucallpa. This is how she is increasing her working capital, which enables her to help her husband with some of their household expenses. With her new loan for 1,800.00 nuevos soles [Peruvian currency] Margot will buy a sack of wolf fish, a sack of black prochilodus and a sack of catfish. Loans from Manuela Ramos have helped Margot start her business. She has been able to help her husband with part of the household expenses and live comfortably, with no more worries.

loan.use: She will buy a sack of wolf fish, a sack of black prochilodus and a sack of catfish.

loan.name: Ramla

texts.en: Ramla is 28 years old and is married with one child who is 2 1/2 years old. For 3 years she has sold clothes such as clothes for men and clothes for women. Her business is open from 8 am until 8 pm every day. Ramla has requested a loan from Kiva lenders via Vision Finance Company in order to purchase clothing to sell. If this is reached, Ramla hopes to earn more profits. With these profits she expects to save in the future and to reinvest in her business.

loan.use: To purchase more clothes

loan.name: Isabel

texts.es: La seora Isabel es socia del banco comunal Las Innovadoras, del Distrito Calleria, Departamento D. ucayali, tiene 72 aos D. edad, est casada y tiene 8 hijos. Solo vive con su esposo. lleva 2 aos perteneciando a la familia D. Manuela Ramos y se dedica a la venta D. ropa D. segunda mano, pero importada, mercadera que compra en la ciudad D. lima. Con su nuevo prestamo D. S/. 1,000.00 nuevos soles comprar un fardo D. ropa. Ella realiza sta actividad en su propia casa y su esposo la ayuda. Isabel est muy agradecida por los prstamos que otorga Manuela Ramos porque en otras entidades ya no pueD. acceder a ningun credito por lo avanzado D. su edad.
texts.en:
Isabel is a member of the village bank "Las Innovadoras" [The Innovators] in the district of Calleria, in the department of Ucayali. She is 72 years old, married and has 8 children. She lives alone with her husband.
For two years she has been part of the Manuela Ramos family and selling imported secondhand clothing. She buys the merchandise in the city of Lima.
With a loan of 1000 nuevo soles she will buy a large sack of secondhand clothing.
She runs her business out of her own home with the help of her husband. Isabel is very grateful for the loans that Manuela Ramos has given her because other banks would not give her loans because of her advanced age.

loan.use: Buy second-hand clothing in bulk

loan.name: Badegdg

texts.fr: Monsieur Badegdg est mari avec 2 enfants charge. Il fait le commerce de crales. Il compte 12 ans dans cette activit et achte les crales Ani en gros. Ensuite il les revend en dtail. Il a dj bien rembours un crdit. Il demande Wages un prt pour acheter 5 sacs dharicots. N Lom en 1975, il habite quartier Attigou.
texts.en:
Mr. Badegdg is married with two children in his care. He was born in Lom in 1975, and now lives in the Attigou neighborhood.
He sells grain, and has 12 years of experience in this business. He buys his stock wholesale in Ani, then sells the grain at retail.
His previous loan was repaid without incident. He is now seeking a loan from WAGES to buy five bags of beans.

loan.use: Purchase of grain

loan.name: Angele

texts.en:
Angele is 37 years old and is married with one child who is ten years old. Angele has had her boutique for two months and employs 1 person to help her. Her business is open from 7 am to 7 pm during the week.
Angele will use this loan to purchase more goods such us cooking oil, soap, biscuits, pens, etc., to sell. If she is successful and able to make a profit from the use of her loan, she would like to build her own house.

loan.use: To expand her boutique

loan.name: Zaida

texts.es: La seora Zaida es socia del banco comunal Carmen Cabrejos, del Distrito calleria, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 42 aos de edad, est casada y tiene 2 hijos menores. Su esposo tiene su negocio independiente. Zaida tiene una pequea bodega en su casa, donde tambin recibe la ayuda de sus hijos cuando sale hacer sus compras o cuando est ocupada haciendo los que aceres de su hogar. Con este prstamo de S/. 1,800.00 nuevos soles comprar: 1 caja de aceite, 1 bolsa de fideos, 1paquete de sopas en sobres, 6 bolsas de fideo chino, 1 caja de leche chica, 2 paquetes de salchicha, 1 saco de arroz, 1 saco de azcar, caja de lava vajilla, 1 paquete de detergente, caja de jabn en barra, 2 tiras de champ en sach. Trabajando todos estos aos Zaida ha podido cubrir algunas necesidades de su hogar, incluos ayudar a su esposo con otros gastos. Agradece a Manuela Ramos por los prstamos que ha tenido todos estos aos, que le ha servido para hacer crecer su negocio.
texts.en:
Zaida is a member of the Carmen Cabrejos communal bank, in the Calleria district of the Department of Ucayali. She is 42 years old and married, and she has 2 minor children. Her husband has an independent business.
Zaida runs a small general store in her home, where she also receives help from her children when she goes out to do the shopping or when she is busy with household tasks.
With this loan for 1,800.00 Peruvian new soles, she will buy: 1 case of oil, 1 bag of noodles, 1 package of soup in envelopes, 6 bags of Chinese noodles, 1 case of small milks, 2 packages of sausages, 1 sack of rice, 1 sack of sugar, case of dish soap, 1 package of detergent, case of bar soap, and 2 cases of shampoo in sachets.
Working for all of these years, Zaida has been able to cover some necessities in her household and help her husband with other expenses.
She is grateful to Manuela Ramos for the loans she has had over the years, which have helped her to expand her business.

loan.use: To purchase various products for the store, such as one box of oil, 1 packet of noodles, 1 package of soap, 6 bags of chinese noodles, etc.

loan.name: Zissi

texts.fr: Dame Zissi a 4 enfants et ge de 41 ans. Elle est marie. Elle vend les pagnes et perles . Elle sapprovisionne Accra au Ghana et au grand march Lom. Elle revend son domicile et cumule 5 ans dexprience. Elle demande un crdit pour se rapprovisionner et satisfaire plus de clients.
texts.en: Mrs. Zissi has four children and she is 41 years old. She is married. She sells lengths of African-print cloth and beads. She buys her stock in Accra (Ghana) and at the Grand Market in Lom. She sells out of her house and has five years of experience. She is asking for this loan to replenish her stock and better satisfy her clientele.

loan.use: purchase of lengths of African-print cloth and beads

loan.name: Zaida Antonia

texts.es: Zaida es comerciante de venta de frutas y verduras, vendiendo tambin ropa nueva y ropa usada con varios aos en las ventas, pues ha logrado aumentar sus ventas con financiamiento que Afodenic ha dado, Iniciando con pequeas compras de mercadera, hoy en da sus niveles de venta aumentaron al ofrecer ms variedad en sus mercaderas con precios ms competitivos. Con este nuevo prstamo es el sexto en donde invertir en la compra de cosmticos y productos de uso personal como: pastas de dientes, cepillo, jabn de bao, shampoo, gelatina, mquina de afeitar, papal higinico para tener variedad para mejores ventas.
texts.en:
Zaida is a saleswoman who sells fruits and vegetables. She also sells new and used clothing. She has managed to increase her sales through the loans that Afodenic have given her. Zaida started out making small purchases of merchandise but her sales levels have increased and now she offers a larger variety of merchandise at more competitive prices.
Zaida will use this new loan (her sixth) to invest in buying cosmetics and personal care products such as toothpaste, brushes, bath soap, shampoo, gelatin, razors and toilet paper in order to increase the variety of products that she offers and improve her sales.

loan.use: to buy cosmetics and personal care products such as toothpaste, bath soap, toilet paper, gelatin and shampoo in order to improve her sales

loan.name: Clement

texts.en:
Clement is 31 years old. For two years he has owned a small shop which sells mobile phones. His business is open from 8 am until 5 pm every day except on Saturday.
Clement has requested a loan from Kiva lenders via Vision Finance Company in order to purchase more mobile phones for his business. If this is reached, Clement hopes to earn more profits. With these profits he expects to save money for his future and to expand his business.

loan.use: To buy more mobile phones to sell

loan.name: Ameyo Akpdz

texts.fr: Dame Ameyo a 29 ans et est marie. Elle a charge 2 enfants. Pour amliorer les conditions de vie de ses enfants, elle fait la vente des produits BB. Elle a commenc en 2007 et sapprovisionne la Brasserie du Bnin. Elle revend les produits la devanture de sa maison. Elle a reu du crdit quelle a dj bien rembours. Elle sollicite un prt pour se rapprovisionner. La dame en question est celle qui a ouvert le frigitaire.
texts.en:
Ameyo is 29 years old. She is married with 2 dependent children. To improve her children's standard of living, she sells products from the "Brasserie du Bnin" (the Benin Brewery). She began this activity in 2007 and she obtains her supplies from the brewery. The products are then re-sold in front of her house.
Ameyo has properly repaid previous loans. She is requesting this loan in order to re-stock. Ameyo can be seen in the photo opening the refrigerator.

loan.use: To buy products from the "Brasserie de Benin"

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to purchase clothing

loan.name: Maritza

texts.es:
La seora Maritza es socia del banco comunal Carmen Cabrejos, del Distrito de Calleria, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 46 aos de edad, est casada y su esposo se desempea como corredor de madera (comercio). Tiene 5 hijos pero todos son mayores, una de ellas vive en argentina. Es socia de Manuela Ramos desde hace diez aos, se dedica a la confeccin de adornos, cojines y todo lo que son manualidades, stos productos los enva a su hija (quien vive en Argentina) para que los venda porque all los oferta a mejor precio. Su nuevo prstamo de S/. 2,000.00 nuevos soles lo invertir en la compra: de 15 metros de tela raso en varios colores, doc. de hilos para coser de varios colores, 4 hilos para tejer, 6 cintas satinadas, 1 ciento de aplicaciones, de mostacillas, 10 metros de tela toalla. Esta actividad la realiza ntegramente en su casa y no interfiere en los quehaceres de su hogar.
La seora Maritza agradece a Manuela Ramos por la ayuda que brinda a sus socias con las orientaciones de cmo llevar su negocio, por medio de sus promotoras y por supuesto por los prstamos.
texts.en:
Seora Maritza is a member of the Carmen Cabrejos communal bank, in the district of Calleria, Ucayali department. She is 46 years old and is married. Her husband works as a timber merchant. She has 5 children, all of whom are grown up. One of her daughters lives in Argentina.
Seora Maritza has been a member of [the field partner] Manuela Ramos for 10 years. She makes decorative items, cushions, and all kinds of handicrafts. She sends these to her daughter in Argentina for her to sell, because they fetch a higher price there. Her new loan of 2,000 Soles will be invested in the purchase of: 15 metres of satin cloth in various colours, half a dozen different colours of sewing cotton, 4 types of yarn for weaving, 6 satin edgings, 100 applique patches, a quarter of glass beads, 10 metres of towelling cloth. She works at home, and the work does not interfere with the household chores.
Seora Maritza is grateful to Manuela Ramos for the help they offer to their members, in terms of the training they give on how to build up your business, the legal advice, and of course for the loans.

loan.use: She will buy 15 metres of satin cloth in various colours, half a dozen different colours of sewing cotton, 4 types of yarn for weaving, 6 satin edgings, 100 applique patches, a quarter of glass beads, 10 metres of towelling cloth.

loan.name: Maria Rosario

texts.es: La seora Rosario es socia del banco comunal Carmen Cabrejos del Distrito calleria, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 66 aos de edad, est casada y tiene 4 hijos, todos tiene con sus respectivas familias. Hace diez aos que pertenece a la familia de Manuela Ramos y tiene su negocio de venta de productos por catlogo, tiene una vitrina donde exhibe todos sus productos y puede estar a la vista de todos. Con su nuevo prstamo de S/. 3,000.00 nuevos soles invertir en la compra de ms productos de belleza como cosmticos y perfumes; 2 rmel para pestaa, 3 cuartetos de sombra, 2 rubor compacto, 2 lociones, 1 champ, 1 enjuague, 2 cremas para peinar, 1 coloracin en crema permanente, 2 protectores solares, 4 colonias para nios, 2 jabones liquido, 2 talcos 3 lpiz delineadores para ojos.2 brillo labial, 2delineadores retrctil para ojos, 2 mascarillas purificantes cutis mixto, 2 desmaquillador, 2 gel desmaquillador para ojos y labios, gel anti-bolsas y ojeras. Sus prstamos son invertidos en su negocio porque es la fuente de ingreso y por eso tiene que estar bien surtido, generalmente tiene clientes a quienes vende a crdito y que van pagndole semanalmente, mensual o diario, segn el acuerdo al que lleguen. Manuela Ramos le dio la oportunidad y la est aprovechando bien, quiere seguir trabajando para poder ayudar a su familia.
texts.en:
Mrs. Rosario is a member of the "Carmen Cabrejos" communal bank in the Calleria District in the department of Ucayali. She is 66 years old, married and has four children who all have their own families.
For ten years she has belonged to the Manuela Ramos group, selling products through catalogue. She also has a display case to exhibit her products for all to see.
With the new 3,000 PEN loan she plans to buy beauty products such as cosmetics and perfume: 2 mascaras, 3 eyeshadow sets, 2 compact blush-ons, 2 lotions, 1 shampoo, 1 conditioner, 2 hair creams, 1 permanent hair color, 2 sunscreens, 4 children's cologne, 2 liquid soaps, 2 talcum powders, 3 eyeliners, 2 lip glosses, 2 retractile eyeliners, 2 purifying facial masks for mixed skin, 2 makeup removers, 2 eye and lip makeup remover gel, anti-puffiness eye gel.
She invests her loans in her business since this is her source of income and she needs to keep it well stocked. Generally she sells to customers on a credit basis and they pay her weekly, monthly or daily, depending on the terms of agreement.
Manuela Ramos gave her this opportunity and she is taking full advantage of it. She wants to conintue working to help her family.

loan.use: To buy beauty products such as cosmetics and perfume

loan.name: Relia Edelvis

texts.es: La seora Relia, es socia del banco comunal Carmen Cabrejos, del Distrito D. Calleria, Departamento D. Ucayali. Tiene 52 aos D. edad, est casada y tiene 4 hijos, dos D. ellos viven en su casa, su esposo se desempea como mecnico. Lleva 10 aos trabajando con Manuela Ramos, prstamos que le sirvi para poder hacer un pequeo capital, con lo cual pueD. respaldar su negocio D. venta D. productos D. belleza por catlogo, negocio que le ha servido para poder ayudar a su esposo con algunos gastos y tambin para realizar sus pagos puntuales al banco comunal. Con este prstamo D. S/. 1,600.00 nuevos soles comprar 4 colonias para hombres, 2 colonias para mujer, 2 polvos para cara, 2 bases D. maquillajes, 2 cuartetos D. sombras, 1 esmalte para uas, 3 lpiz labiales, 2 lpiz delineadores, 3 cremas para el cuerpo, 1 quita esmalte, 2 bloqueadores, 1 talco. Todos estos aos ha estado generando sus propios ingresos, con esos ingresos pueD. seguir ayudando a sus 2 hijos que todava viven en su casa.
texts.en:
Mrs. Relia is a member of the "Carmen Cabrejos" communal bank in the Calleria District in the department of Ucayali. She is 52 years old, married and has four children, two of which still live at home. Her husband is a mechanic.
She has been working with Manuela Ramos for 10 years. The loans have helped as working capital for her business selling beauty products by catalogue. Her income allows her to help her husband cover expenses and to make payments on the loan from the communal bank.
With this 1600 PEN loan she plans to buy 4 men's colognes, 2 women's colognes, 2 face powders, 2 foundation make-ups, 2 eyeshadow sets, 1 nail polish, 3 lipsticks, 2 lip liners, 3 body lotions, 1 nail polish remover, 2 sunscreens, 1 talcum powder. All these years she has been generating her own income which she also uses to help the two children living at home.

loan.use: To buy beauty products

loan.name: Martha Rosa

texts.es: Martha es una pequea comerciante, que inicio sus ventas hace cuatro aos, en la venta de granos bsicos y carne de cerdo, con ayuda de su esposo quien labora como comerciante. Sus ventas comienzan a dar un giro diferente al aumentar la variedad de productos con financiamiento que Afodenic otorga mediante cuatro ciclos que ha trabajado, en donde comienza hacer comida rpida, venta de gaseosas, refrescos entre otros. Lo que quiere seguir invirtiendo para un futuro mejor de su familia, lo que con este nuevo prstamo comprara: salchichas, pastas para preparacin de hotdog, hamburguesa, fritanga, refrescos, gaseosas en donde vende en su carrito cada da. Y que espera seguir ofreciendo a sus clientes ms calidad de productos.
texts.en:
Martha is a saleswoman who started selling products four years ago. She started out selling basic grains and pork with the help of her husband who is also a salesman.
Martha's sales started taking a different turn as she increased her range of products through loans she received from Afodenic over four loan cycles. She started selling fast food, sodas and soft drinks.
Martha would like to continue investing so that she can offer a better future to her family. She will use this new loan to buy sausages and other ingredients for making hot dogs, burgers and fried snacks. She will also buy soft drinks and sodas which she sells on her small cart every day. Martha hopes to continue offering her customers better quality products.

loan.use: to buy food products for making burgers and hot dogs, soda, etc.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: To buy construction tools

loan.name: Angela Maria

texts.es: ngela es una pequea comerciante, con su propio negocio, que inicio hace un ao con una pequea pulpera, en su casa de habitacin, ya que anteriormente administraba un kiosco. Ha logrado surtir su negocio con prstamo que la institucin ha dado, lo que se ha beneficiado comprando ms granos bsicos, gaseosos, alimentos para mejorar sus niveles de ganancia. Con este nuevo prstamo ser para comprar variedad de productos como: Carne, pollo, productos lcteos, productos enlatados, granos bsicos, cereales, leche de pote, gaseosas, golosinas entre otros para surtir su venta a si como la satisfaccin de sus clientes.
texts.en:
ngela is a saleswoman who has her own business which she started a year ago. She owns a grocery store which is located in her own home. Previously, she used to run a kiosk. ngela has managed to stock her store with the previous loan that the institution gave her. She has benefited from the loan, buying more basic grains, sodas and food products in order to improve her profit levels.
ngela will use this new loan to buy a variety of products including meat, chicken, dairy products, canned food, basic grains, cereals, canned milk, sodas and candies, to stock her store and please her customers.

loan.use: to invest in buying basic grains, dairy products, sodas, cereals and other products so that she can sell more

loan.name: El Castillo De Playa Group

texts.es: El nombre del grupo es El Castillo de Paya, llamado as porque la casa de reunin tiene muchas Habitaciones, est ubicado en el estado de Quintana Roo, Playa del Carmen, en Mxico. La Seora Asuncin Mara C. es integrante del grupo, quienes son muy unidas, ella tiene 41 aos y estudio hasta la secundaria, ella se dedica a vender ropa de bazar, en la entrada de su casa desde hace 4 aos, nos solicita el prstamo para seguir invirtiendo en la compra de mercanca y darle una mejor calidad de vida a sus 3 pequeos hijos de 9, 5 y 13 aos de edad, los cuales se siente muy orgullosos de su madre por el esfuerzo y constancia con que ella lucha da con da por ofrecerles una vida mejor vida y educacin.
texts.en: The name of the group is El Castillo de Paya [The Castle of Paya]. It is named this because the meeting house has a lot of rooms. It is located in the state of Quintana Roo, Playa del Carmen, in Mxico. Mrs. Asuncin Mara C. is a member of the group, and it is very close. She is 41 years old and went to junior high school. She has sold clothes from the entryway of her house for 4 years. She is asking us for the loan to keep investing in buying merchandise and to give a better quality of life to her 3 young children, aged 9, 5 and 13. She is very proud to be their mother and she works hard and steadfastly every day to offer them a better life and education.

loan.use: to invest in buying merchandise.

loan.name: Melita

texts.es:
La seora Melita es socia del banco comunal Juntas hasta el final del Distrito de Yarinacocha, Departamento de Ucayali. Tiene 49 aos de edad, es madre soltera y tiene 3 hijos. Lleva diez aos perteneciendo a su banco comunal y se dedica a la confeccin de prendas de vestir, trabajo que realiza hace muchos aos atrs, que le ha servido para poder educar a sus hijos. Con su nuevo prstamo de S/. 2,000.00 nuevos soles comprar una remalladora, 8 conos de hilos de remalle (negro y blanco). Con la remalladora podr dar mejores acabados a las prendas que confecciona y as podr ganar un poquito ms.
Melita agradece a Manuela Ramos por los prstamos. Gracias a su esfuerzo ha sabido formar bien a sus hijos para que sean personas de bien, se siente muy tranquila porque hizo un buen trabajo, siente que su dedicacin no ha sido en vano.
texts.en:
Mrs. Melita is a member of the "Juntas" communal bank in the district of Yarinacocha in the department of Ucayali. She is 49 years old and a single mother of three children.
She has belonged to the communal bank for ten years and she is a seamstress. She has been in this activity for many years, allowing her to educate her children.
With the new 2,000 PEN loan she will buy an overlock sewing machine and 8 bobbins of thread (black and white). She will use the machine to give her products a better finish so she can earn a more income.
Melita is very grateful to Manuela Ramos for the loans. Thanks to her efforts she has been able to educate her children well so they will be successful. She feels satisfied about having done a good job and that her dedication has not been in vain.

loan.use: To buy an overlock sewing machine and 8 bobbins of thread (black and white)

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: To buy straw to make hats

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: To improve his vehicle for student transportation

loan.name: Maria Ignacia

texts.es:
Maria Ignacia es madre de casa de 32 aos de edad. Vive junta a su esposo y 3 hijos en casa propia en el casero Sector Vallecito, una parte rural del distrito de Tambogrande. sta es una zona agrcola que se encuentra en la provincia de Piura, a ms de cuatro horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la regin Lambayeque. Maria Ignacia y su familia no cuenta con servicios bsicos como luz o agua potable.
Maria Ignacia se dedica a la crianza de ganado ovino, el cual cra de edades menores y cuando los animales ya han alcanzado un buen nivel de desarrollo, los vende en el mercado local. En adicin, conjuntamente con su esposo, cultiva y mantiene limn, el cual cra, engorda y cosecha semanalmente para luego comercializarlos tambin en el mercado local. Realiza estas actividades desde hace ms de 4 aos en una parte posterior de su casa.
Desea invertir su crdito en la compra de alimentos balanceados para el engorde de su ganado y para el mantenimiento de su cultivo de limn. Espera lograr un buen peso y tamao de sus animales y productos para venderlos a un mejor precio y seguir creciendo en su actividad. Por ello, ha credo conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un prstamo de 1500 nuevos soles. Maria Ignacia es una mujer muy trabajadora. Ella y su esposo trabajan juntos para seguir adelante y lograr mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Maria Ignacia is a 32 year old mother. She lives with her husband and three children in her own home in the Sector Vallecito rural area of the district of Tambogrande. This is an agricultural area in the province of Piur which is more than four hours from the city of Chiclayo, the capital of the Lambayeque region. Maria Ignacia and her family do not have basic utilities such as electricity or running water.
Maria Ignacia raises sheep which she sells at the local market. Also, together with her husband, she grows lemons which she harvests weekly and sells at the local market. She has been carrying out this activity for over four years in the backyard of her home.
She plans to use the loan to buy balanced feed for her livestock and for maintenance of her lemon crop. She hopes her sheep reach a good size and weight so she can get a better price for them and continue growing this business. She requested a loan in the amount of 1500 PEN through Edpyme Alternativa. Maria Ignacia is a very hard worker. She and her husband work together to get ahead and improve their family's lifestyle.

loan.use: To buy balanced feed for sheep and lemons

loan.name: Sarita Colonia Group

texts.es: L. Srta. Adeluz es soltera, tiene 19 aos D. edad, actualmente es socia en L. alcanca comunal Sarita Colonia grupo conformado por 8 socios que se dedican a diversas actividades D. comercio. Adeluz trabaja en una tienda que lo inaguro hace un mes donD. venD. carmines ganchos collares anillos y a su vez venD. productos D. belleza, este trabajo surge a raz D. que Adeluz quera estudiar pero sus padres no contaban con los medios econmicos para solventar sus estudios es as que Adeluz pone su negocio con el fin D. juntar dinero para estudiar y a sus vez brindarle una mejor calidad D. vida a sus padres. Este es el primer prstamo que Edaprospo le otorga, y gracias a ello comprara mercadera para implementar su negocio. Sabemos que Adeluz cumplir sus metas con mucho trabajo y esfuerzo y que los prstamos D. Edaprospo le ayudaran.
texts.en:
Miss Adeluz is 19 years old and single. She is a member of the "Sarita Colonia" communal bank which is comprised of 8 members who are involved in different business activities. Adeluz has a store that she inaugurated a month ago and she sells lipstick, necklaces, rings and beauty products. She began this job because she wanted to study and her parents didn't have the financial means to pay for her education. Adeluz started her business to save enough money to study so she can proviD. a better lifestyle for her parents.
This is her first loan through Edaprospo and because of it she will be able to buy merchandise for her store. We know that Adeluz will reach her goals through her hard work and the help of the Edaprospo loan.

loan.use: To buy merchandise

loan.name: Maria

texts.es:
Mara es una madre de familia de 66 aos de edad, es casada y reside junto a su esposo y a sus hijos en su casa propia ubicada en el distrito agrcola de Morropn, una zona que pertenece a la Regin de Piura que se encuentra situada a ms tres horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo.
Se dedica a la preparacin y venta de alimentos desde hace cuatro aos, ella prepara sus alimentos en su domicilio para luego ofrecerlos en venta al pblico en general. El negocio goza de muy buena acogida por parte de sus clientes debido a la buena sazn con la que prepara su comida. Mara se vale de los ingresos que recibe de esta actividad para ayudar a su esposo a solventar la economa de su familia.
Mara desea ampliar su negocio con la compra de insumos, asi tambin la compara d mesas, sillas y otros accesorios para mejorar el ambiente donde ofrece su servicio de modo que pueda ampliar su produccin y aumentar sus ventas. Por ello ha credo conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crdito de 1500 nuevos soles.
texts.en:
Maria is a 66 year old mother. She lives with her husband and children in her own home in the farm district of Morropn. This area belongs to the Piura Region which is three hours from the city of Chiclayo.
For four years she has been running a business preparing and selling food. She makes the food in her home and then sells it to the general public. She is very popular with her customers because of her delicious food. Mara uses the income she earns to help her husband with household expenses.
Mara wants to expand her business by buying more ingredients and tables and chairs as well as other decorative items so she can offer better service to customers. She is hoping to increase production and sales. She has requested a loan in the amount of 1500 PEN through Edpyme alternativa.

loan.use: To buy food ingredients, chairs, tables and other decorative items

loan.name: Floria

texts.es: La seora Floria es socia del banco comunal Nuevo Edn, del Distrito de Yarinacocha, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 60 aos de edad, es madre soltera y tiene 3 hijos, solo uno vive con ella. Tiene su puesto (tienda) de comida en el mercado de Yarinacocha, negocio que lo realiza en horas de la maana, y en la tarde le da tiempo para realizar las compras de insumos para preparar las comidas del siguiente da. Con su nuevo prstamo de S/. 2,300.00 nuevos soles comprar: 2 docenas de platos, 1 balde para refresco, 1 docena de vasos, 1 docena de tazas, docenas de jarras de plstico de medio litro. 1 espumadera, 1 baln de gas, 1 juego de coladores, docena de secadores, 2 fuentes. La seora Floria est contenta con su trabajo, siempre est sonriente para su clientela que a diario acude a su puesto para saborear los platillos que prepara. Est feliz porque cuenta con un capital para seguir trabajando y poder tener un ingreso para solventar sus gastos y compromiso que tiene con Manuela Ramos.
texts.en:
Mrs. Floria is a member of the "Nuevo Edn" communal bank in the district of Yarinacocha, which is in the department of Ucayali. She is 60 years old and a single mother of three children, one of which lives with her.
She has a food stall in the Yarinacocha market which she runs in the morning. In the afternoon she does the shopping to buy the ingredients she needs to prepare the meals the next day.
With the loan she has requested in the amount of 2,300 PEN she will buy: 2 dozen plates, a shelf for softdrinks, 1 dozen glasses, 1 dozen cups, 1/2 dozen half liter plastic jugs, 1 skimmer, 1 gas balloon, 1 set of collanders, 1/2 dozen dryers, 2 serving dishes.
Mrs. Floria is happy with her work and is always smiling as her customers come by to taste the dishes she prepares. She is grateful for the capital to continue working so she can make an income to cover her expenses and timely payments to Manuela Ramos.

loan.use: To buy food stall utensils

loan.name: Bernardita

texts.es: Bernardita C. F., est casado tiene 63 aos de edad y vive con su esposo. Ella pretende comprar unos insumos para la mejora de su finca de caf. Ella cuenta con el terreno ya sembrado de caf y lo que quiere es mejorar su prxima cosecha y dar un mayor rendimiento en la produccin, con estos productos lo que ella ara es mejorar la acidez del suelo de su finca para que la tierra vuelva a dar su mejor rendimiento en esta prxima produccin. Ella pretende crecer como caficultora de la zona y generar ms ingresos para su bienestar y la de su esposo y a su vez tener su futuro un poco ms seguro. Es el primer prstamo que recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no haba tenido antes otros prstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el prstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho ms baja.
texts.en:
Bernardita C. F. is married and 63 years old. She lives with her husband. She intends on buying some materials to improve her coffee farm. She has land that has already been planted with coffee and she wants to improve her next crop and have a larger harvest. With these products she improves the soil acidity in her farm so that the soil will yield more in the next harvest. She intends on growing as a coffee grower in the area and make more income for her own wellbeing and her husband's, and also to have a future that's a little more secure.
This is the first loan that she has received from FUDECOSUR. She hadn't had any loans from state banks beofre, but FUDECOSUR has offered her the loan on better terms and much lower interest.

loan.use: To buy calcium carbonate for coffee crop

loan.name: Edward

texts.en:
Edward M., owner of ND Verse Independent, provides development and management services for independent artists. Having been in business just over a year, Edward has already worked with a diverse group of influential artists in the visual and performing arts industries. As a promotional manager in the city of Corpus Christi, Edward works with talented individuals who want to move beyond the local scene to become nationally recognized artists. Edward says that when deciding to represent prospective clients, he must see they have the passion to become world-class working artists.
Edward is a Vietnam-era veteran who grew up in a family of artists. His father played the guitar, and his mother is a published author. Edward sees ND Verse Independent as the natural result of his upbringing. Studying business administration at Del Mar College in Corpus Christi helped supplement his industry knowledge with the technical know-how needed for managing the financial side of his business.
Edward works out of his home, but he wants to open an office in the basement of a popular Corpus Christi nightclub. He feels such a move could be good for the image of his business, and also keep him in sync with the pulse of the local art culture. Edward is using this loan to cover the legal fees to transition his business from a sole proprietorship to a LLC (Limited Liability Company). He is also using the loan to purchase QuickBooks, which will help him better manage his finances.
Though he has had national and international artists request his services, he has decided, for now at least, to work exclusively with South-Texan artists. He believes his market niche is with local artists, and that the personalized attention he can give sets him apart from his competitors.
Working with local artists does not mean that Edward only schedules local events. The past year took Edward to California, where one of his clients performed shows at well-known venues. Another of Edwards clients is a twice-published author, in addition to being an accomplished painter. This summer, Edward and this client will be making an extended tour through the Midwest and West Coast to promote the clients most recent book, as well as showcase his art at select shows.
Check out his website at www.ndverse.net.

loan.use: Legal costs to transition his business and purchase of accounting software

loan.name: Madeleine

texts.es: La seora Madeleine es socia del banco comunal La Lupuna, del Distrito de calleria, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 34 aos de edad, est casada y tiene un hijo, su esposo es empleado pblico. Ella es profesora de profesin, pero no lo ejerce porque no hay trabajo. Lleva trabajando con los prstamos de Manuela Ramos desde hace 2 aos y se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza por catlogo, para ayudar a su esposo con los gastos de la casa hasta poder conseguir una plaza en algn colegio. Con su nuevo prstamo de S/.1,300.00 nuevos soles comprar: 4 colonias para hombres, 1 crema de afeitar, 1 bloqueador, 2 lpiz labiales, 1 cuarteto de sombras, 1 champ, 1 tinte para cabello, 1 rimer, 1 lpiz delineador de cejas, 1 talco para cara, 1 colonia para bebe, 1 crema lipo reductora, 1 colonia para mujer, 1 crema para las manos. Las ganancias no son muchas pero le alcanza para poder pagar su cuenta en el banco comunal. Agradece a Manuela Ramos por la oportunidad.
texts.en:
Madeleine is a member of the La Lupuna community bank of the distrito of Calleria, departament of Ucayali. He is 34 years old, married and has one son. Her husband is a public employee. She is a teacher by profession, but she does not teach because there is no work.
She has been working with loans from Manuela Ramos for 2 years. She sells beauty products via catalogue to help her husband with the household expenses until she can find a position at a high school.
With the new loan of S/.1,300.00 nuevos soles she will buy: 4 men's colognes, 1 shaving cream, 1 sunblock, 2 lipsticks, 1 eyeshadow quartet, 1 shampoo, 1 hair dye, 1 mascara, 1 eyebrow pencil, 1 face powder, 1 baby cologne, 1 reducing cream, 1 women's cologne, 1 hand cream.
The earnings are small but enough to be able to pay for her account in the community bank. She is grateful to Manuela Ramos for the opportunity.

loan.use: She will buy: 4 men's colognes, 1 shaving cream, 1 sunblock, 2 lipsticks, 1 eyeshadow quartet, 1 shampoo, 1 hair dye, 1 mascara,1 eyebrow pencil, 1 facepowder, 1 baby cologne, 1 reducing cream, 1 women's cologne,1 hand cream.

loan.name: Mariposas De Barrio Alto Group

texts.es: Este grupo se llama Mariposas de barrio alto y tiene este nombre porque son grandes artistas de la supervivencia tras sus espectaculares colores, formas, y esconden talentos insospechados; barrio alto por el lugar de donde se renen, se ubica en el Estado de Hidalgo. El grupo esta conformado por 11 integrantes es la primera vez que realiza un crdito. La seora Rosa Aide S. T. es integrante del grupo. Tiene 36 aos, estudio el la secundaria, y tiene en total 2 hijas mujeres. Ella vende ropa que inicio desde hace 2 aos. Solicita el prstamo para comprar mercanca para agrandar su negocio. Los clientes dicen que les agrada comprar con ella porque la ropa es de buena calidad y barata, la seora es amable y muy alegre. Al momento de solicitar este prstamo se siente contenta y con muchas ganas de trabajar, ya que solicito el crdito para comprar ms mercancia y sus clientes tengan de donde escoger y para seguir brindando un buen servicio, y a su vez lograr su sueo de poner un local y as apoyar a los gastos de su familia pra brindarles una mejor vida de calidad.
texts.en:
This group is called 'Mariposas de Barrio Alto' (Butterflies of Barrio Alto). The 'butterflies' part of the name was chosen because the group's members are great survival artists behind their spectacular colors and shapes, and they hide unexpected talents. 'Barrio Alto' is the name of the place where the group meets. The group is located in the State of Hidalgo.
This group has 11 members and this is the first time that they have taken out a loan. Rosa Aide S. T. is a member of the group. She is 36 years old, has a high school level of education, and has two daughters. She started selling clothes two years ago.
Rosa is requesting this loan to buy merchandise in order to expand her business. Her customers say that they like to buy from her because the clothes she offers are good quality and also cheap. Rosa is a kind and very cheerful lady. At the moment of requesting this loan, she is feeling happy and very keen to work. She requested her loan to buy more merchandise so that her customers would have more choice and so that she could continue providing them with a good service. She also wants to fulfil her dream of setting up her own premises and supporting her family's expenses in order to provide them with a better quality of life.

loan.use: to buy merchandise

loan.name: Ambar

texts.es: mbar, de 26 aos, vive en su casa que es propia al lado de sus padres y hermanos menores; juntos buscan salir adelante en busca del progreso. Esta empeosa joven empez a trabajar desde que termin el colegio; y hace un ao instal el negocio de venta de ropa por pedidos. Le va muy bien pues ahora en el negocio le ayuda una prima, pues ella empez a trabajar en una fbrica con un sueldo estable. Solo durante los fines de semana ella misma vende la ropa y dice que le esta yendo bien por eso es que solicita el crdito que le permitir continuar trabajando en busca del progreso. Dice que esta muy satisfecha pues el negocio ha funcionado sobretodo con la ayuda de esta pariente que tiene muchas amistades que le encargan distintas prendas a la semana. Como es una mujer emprendedora para el futuro tiene planeado instalar una tienda de venta de ropa en un mercado de su zona, pues quiere mejorar sus ventas. Es el segundo crdito que tiene con MFP y promete pagar puntualmente sus cuotas, pues no quiere quedar mal con las personas que hicieron posible este aporte que le permitir continuar con su negocio. mbar tiene planeado invertir el crdito solicitado en la compra de diversas prendas, pues tiene un pedido pendiente que quiere cumplir.
texts.en:
mbar is 26 years old and lives in her own home together with her parents and younger siblings. Together they look to get ahead in life in search of progress. This hard-working young woman started work as soon as she finished school. One year ago she set up a business selling clothes to order. Her business is doing very well and one of her cousins now helps her in the business. She started working in a factory, making a stable wage. She sells her clothes at weekends. She tells us that her business is going well and this is why she is requesting a loan which will allow her to continue working in search of progress. mbar tells us that she is very satisfied since her business is working with the help of this family member and she has many friends who order different clothes from her each week.
As mbar is an enterprising woman, in the future she plans to set up a clothes store in a local market as she would like to improve her sales. This is her second loan from MFP and she pledges to make her repayments on time since she doesn't want to let down the people who made this support possible as it will allow her to continue in her business. mbar plans to invest the loan she has requested in buying different items of clothes as she has an order pending that she would like to fill.

loan.use: To buy more clothes to stock her business

loan.name: Milagritos

texts.es: Milagritos, de 26 aos, vive en su casa que es propia al lado de su esposo Jos de 30 aos, fabricante de calzado; y sus 2 hijos pequeos; juntos se esfuerzan a diario para salir adelante. Hace ms de 4 aos esta empeosa dama se dedica a la produccin y comercializacin de calzados y sandalias. Manifiesta que cuando era joven ayudaba a sus tos en el taller de fabricacin de zapatos que esta ubicado en una pieza de su casa, y luego cuando form su familia no dudo en empezar a vender los zapatos (de acuerdo a la temporada) en un mercado mayorista de su zona. Ella fabrica una vez a la semana y durante los 5 das tiles restantes vende, adems dice que su mercadera sale constantemente y por eso necesita capital con regular frecuencia; es por esta razn que solicita el crdito que le permitir comprar materiales para producir al lado de sus familiares mayor cantidad de materiales para calzados y sandalias. Como es una mujer emprendedora para el futuro tiene planeado instalar una tienda de venta de ropa y calzado en un mercado de su zona. Es el segundo crdito que tiene con MFP y promete pagar puntualmente sus cuotas, pues no quiere quedar mal con las personas que hicieron posible este aporte que le permitir continuar con el progreso de su negocio. Milagritos tiene planeado invertir el crdito solicitado en la compra de materiales que necesita para la fabricacin de todo tipo de calzado, pues necesita abastecerse para la campaa escolar que esta prxima.
texts.en: 26 year old Milagritos lives in her own home along with her 30 year old husband, Jos, a shoe maker, and their 2 small children. Together they strive daily to move ahead in life. For more than 4 years, this earnest woman has been engaged in making and selling shoes and sandals. When she was young she used to help her uncles in a shoe-making workshop that is located on one floor of her house, and later, when she had her own family, she didn't hesitate to start selling shoes (according to the season) in the major market in the area. She makes shoes one day a week and during the remaining 5 working days she sells them. She says that her merchandise sells-out constantly and so she frequently needs capital. This is why she is requesting a loan that will enable her to buy materials to make, along with her family, a greater quantity of shoes and sandals. As she is an enterprising woman, for the future she plans to start a store selling clothes and shoes in the neighborhood market. This is the second loan that she has had from MFP and she promises to make the repayments punctually as she doesn't want to be seen in a bad light by the people who are making this contribution that will enable her to keep building her business. Milagritos plans to use the loan to buy the materials to make all types of shoes, and she also needs supplies for the upcoming school year.

loan.use: To buy materials for making shoes.

loan.name: Pascuala

texts.es: Pascuala, de 45 aos, vive en su casa que es propia al lado de su esposo Javier de 44 aos, que es taxista y sus cuatro hijos, de los cuales se hace cargo de los tres menores, pues el mayor trabaja y estudia; juntos se esfuerzan cada da para salir adelante. Desde hace un ao, esta emprendedora mujer se dedica a la preparacin y venta de variados bocadillos (como papa rellena, cachanga y mazamorras) adems comercializa chicha (refresco peruano) y gelatina que vende muy bien sobretodo durante la poca veraniega. Esta muy satisfecha pues desde que empez a comercializar sus bocadillos y refrescos afuera de un colegio de su zona le ha ido bien pues los alumnos la prefieren por la calidad de sus productos. Hace unos meses no tena capital suficiente para invertir en su negocio, pero ahora con el crdito espera aumentar sus ventas y ganancias. Manifiesta que ella misma prepara sus cachangas y papas rellenas y las ofrece a los alumnos a un mdico precio. Como es una mujer emprendedora para el futuro tiene planeado instalar un kiosco fijo dentro de algn centro educativo de su zona. Es el segundo crdito que tiene con MFP y promete pagar puntualmente sus cuotas, pues no quiere quedar mal con las personas que hicieron posible este aporte que le permitir continuar trabajando en busca del progreso. Pascuala tiene planeado invertir el crdito solicitado en la compra de ingredientes al por mayor que le hacen falta para continuar preparando sus bocadillos y refrescos, de esta manera espera continuar adelante.
texts.en:
Pascuala is 45 years old. She lives in her own home together with her husband, 44 year-old Javier who is a taxi driver, and their four children. The three youngest children are still in their care but the eldest is working and studying. Together they work hard every day to get ahead in life.
For one year, this enterprising woman has been making and selling a variety of snacks such as 'papa rellena' (mashed potatoes shaped around a filling of ground beef and fried), 'cachanga' (fried tortillas) and 'mazamorra' (a corn-based pudding). She also sells 'chicha' (a Peruvian soft drink) and gelatin desserts which sell very well, especially during the summer. Pascuala is very satisfied because since she started selling her snacks and drinks outside a local school her business has done very well. The students like buying from her because she sells good-quality products.
Some months ago, Pascuala didn't have enough capital to invest in her business but now she hopes to use her loan to increase her sales and profits. She tells us that she prepares her 'cachangas' and 'papas rellenas' herself and offers them for sale to the students at a reasonable price. As she is an enterprising woman, in the future she plans to set up a fixed stall inside a local school.
This is Pascuala's second loan with MFP and she pledges to make her repayments on time as she doesn't want to let down the people who made this support possible as it will allow her to continue working in search of progress. Pascuala plans to invest the loan she has requested in buying ingredients she needs to keep preparing her snacks and drinks wholesale. In this way, she hopes to continue making progress.

loan.use: To buy ingredients for making snacks and soft drinks

loan.name: Las Esforzadas Group

texts.es: Rosala forma parte D. Banco Las Esforzadas conformado por 14 emprendedores, que se desempean en el rubro D. comercio, especficamente; venta de joyas, ropa y abarrotes. Todos pertenecientes a la ciudad de Talca. Rosala quien en la foto aparece sentada y es la primera D. lado izquierdo, se dedica a la venta de joyas y ropa desde hace 4 aos. Su mercadera la compra en el barrio Patronato de la ciudad de Santiago. Su negocio lo realiza puerta a puerta y en tiendas comerciales, ya que Rosala trabaj durante muchos aos en tiendas, por lo que conoci mucha gente quienes ahora son sus clientes frecuentes, llegando a tener 50 clientes actualmente. Con el prstamo comprar ropa y joyas para invertir en su negocio y poder aumentar as sus ingresos. Rosala vive con su esposo y sus dos hijos de 10 y 4 aos de edad. El sueo de Rosala es tener un local establecido, en el centro de la ciudad de Talca, donde pueda aumentar su clientela y generar ms ganancias. En el mbito personal Rosala anhela que sus hijos tengan una mejor calidad en su educacin. Su gran motivacin es sacar adelante a su familia, para brindarles una vida ms confortable. Ella est muy agradecida de Fondo Esperanza. Le gusta mucho participar de las reuniones, ya que se entretiene en stas. Adems es presidenta D. Banco. En cuanto al financiamiento que recibe por medio de Fondo Esperanza, ha sido un gran aporte para su negocio, ya que podr invertir y aumentar sus ingresos. Talca pertenece a la regin D. Maule, ubicada en la zona centro D. pas. Constituye el centro administrativo, econmico y cultural de la regin, siendo la ciudad ms importante D. Valle Central chileno. Sobre Talca existe una curiosa referencia en Chile, la frase "Talca, Pars, y Londres". Entre los mitos al respecto, algunos dicen que es una derivacin de la originalmente dicha por un ingls "Talca parece Londres", por la abundante neblina que cubre frecuentemente la ciudad en la temporada invernal, a semejanza de la capital D. Reino Unido.
texts.en:
Rosala is a member of the Communal Bank Las Esforzadas (The Hardworking Ones), which consists of fourteen entrepreneurs who engage in the retail trade. Specifically they sell jewelry, clothing, and groceries. All of them live in the city of Talca.

In the photograph, Rosala is the first person seated on the left. She has been selling jewelry and clothing for four years. Rosala buys her merchandise in the Patronato neighborhood in the city of Santiago. Her business involves selling door-to-door and to commercial shops. As a result of working many years in retail, Rosala developed many connections who are now regular customers. She currently has fifty clients. With this loan, Rosala will invest in her business by purchasing clothing and jewelry to help increase her revenues.

She dreams of having an established shop in central Talca so that she can expand her customer base and generate more income. In her personal life, Rosala hopes to see her children have a better quality education. Her greatest wish is for her family to get ahead and to provide them a more comfortable life. Rosala is extremely grateful to Fondo Esperanza. She enjoys participating in the meetings and gets great amusement from them. In addition, Rosala serves as the Communal Bank president. The loans from Fondo Esperanza have been a great help to her business because they have allowed her to invest and helped to increase her income.

Talca is located in Maule region in central Chile. It is the administrative, economic, and cultural hub of the region as well as the largest city in Chiles Central Valley. There is a curious saying in Chile, the phrase Talca, Paris, and London. Among the many legends that explain the derivation of this phrase, some say it was originally spoken by an Englishman who said Talca looks like London, referring to the abundant fog that frequently covers the city during the winter season, similar to the British capital.

loan.use: To purchase jewelry and clothing.

loan.name: El Esfuerzo Es Grande Group

texts.es: La Sra. Lila, tiene 5 hijos, es conviviente y trabaja con Edaprospo por primera vez, Lila es integrante del grupo El Esfuerzo es Grande, grupo conformado por 8 amigas que le pusieron este nombre porque el esfuerzo para poner un negocio es grande. Lila trabaja vendiendo comida almuerzos, marcianos desde hace 3 aos, gracias a su esfuerzo y dedicacin ha logrado darles a sus hijos educacin, ha construido su casa y a su vez le ha brindado una mejor calidad de vida a su familia. Con el fin de seguir creciendo a solicitado un nuevo prstamo para comprar un carrito sanguchero y as vender sanguches, salchipapas. Sabemos que Lila cumplir sus metas con mucho trabajo y esfuerzo y que los prstamos de Edaprospo le ayudaran
texts.en:
Sra. Lila is in a common law marriage and has five children. This is her first time to work with EDAPROSPO. Lila is a member of the group El Esfuerzo es Grande (The Effort is Great), which consists of eight friends who chose this name because starting a business requires a great deal of effort.

Lila has been selling lunches and frozen fruit treats for three years. Thanks to her effort and dedication, she has been able to provide her children with an education, build her house, and give her family a better quality of life. In order to continue growing, Lila is requesting a loan to buy a food cart for selling sandwiches and salchipapas (sausages and fried potatoes). She is confident of accomplishing her goals through much work and effort, and with the help of the loans from EDAPROSPO.

loan.use: To purchase a food cart.

loan.name: Liana

texts.es:
Liana tiene 23 aos de edad, es casada y reside junto a su esposos e hijos en el distrito de Guadalupe ubicado en la provincia de Pacasmayo, una zona con bastante movimiento comercial que se encuentra ubicada en la regin La Libertad, a ms de dos horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la regin Lambayeque.
Ella cuenta con una bodega instalada en su domicilio. All ofrece en venta a sus vecinos diversos productos de consumo diario entre productos de primera necesidad y abarrotes. El negocio cuenta con una antigedad de 2 aos y actualmente cuenta con una clientela fija y fidelizada. Gracias a esta actividad ella ayuda a su esposo a mantener a su familia y sacarla adelante durante todo este tiempo.
Liana desea ampliar su negocio con la compra de ms mercadera de modo que pueda satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes. Por ello ha credo conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crdito de 1700 nuevos soles.
texts.en:
Liana is 23 years old and married. She lives with her husband and children in the District of Guadalupe in Pacasmayo Province. There is significant commercial activity in this area. The community is located in La Libertad region, which is more than two hours away from the city of Chiclayo, the capital of Lambayeque region.

Liana has a store established in her home. There she offers her neighbors different consumer products such as basic necessities and groceries. Her business has been in existence for two years and currently has a loyal and established customer base. Thanks to her business, she is able to help her husband support their family and move themselves forward all the time.

Liana wants to expand her business by purchasing more merchandise to help her satisfy the demands of her customers. For this reason, she is requesting a loan from Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 1700 PEN.

loan.use: To purchase merchandise for her business.

loan.name: Feliciana

texts.es:
Feliciana, tiene 49 aos D. edad, tiene tres hijos, naci en la ciudad D. Paurcartambo y actualmente, ella vive en la ciudad D. Urubamba. Feliciana se dedica a la venta D. verduras como por ejemplo zapallos, jora y choclos. Ya son 20 aos que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeo que pone en su trabajo. Feliciana en esta oportunidad requiere el prstamo para comprar verduras como por ejemplo maz y zapallos.
Feliciana pertenece al banco comunal Mainique D. la Asociacin Arariwa y se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y as mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Feliciana is 49 years old and has three children. She was born in the city of Paurcartambo, but now she lives in the city of Urubamba. Feliciana sells vegetables such as squash and corn. She has been in this business for twenty years and has done very well as a result of the effort she puts into her business. Feliciana is taking this opportunity to request a loan to buy vegetables, such as corn and squash.

She is a member of the Communal Bank Mainique which is part of Asociacin Arariwa. Feliciana is grateful for the opportunity being given to her and promises to complete her payments on time.

loan.use: To purchase vegetables to sell.

loan.name: Maria

texts.es:
Maria, tiene 41 aos de edad, tiene seis hijos, naci en la ciudad Urubamba del departamento de Cusco y vive en la misma ciudad. Maria se dedica a la venta de verduras es mayorista, ella reparte a los revendedores y vendedoras del mercado de Urubamba. Ya son 15 aos que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeo que pone en su trabajo. Maria en esta oportunidad requiere el prstamo para comprar maz.
Maria pertenece al banco comunal Mainique de la Asociacin Arariwa y se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y as mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Maria is 41 years old and has six children. She was born in the city of Urubamba in the Department of Cusco and still lives there. Maria sells vegetables as a wholesaler. She distributes her products to retailers and merchants at the market in Urubamba. Maria has been in this business for fifteen years and has done very well as a result of the effort she puts into her work. She is taking this opportunity to request a loan to buy corn.

Maria is a member of the Communal Bank Mainique which is part of Asociacin Arariwa. She is grateful for the opportunity being given to her and promises to complete her payments on time.

loan.use: To purchase corn.
